job_title: Python and Kubernetes Software Engineer - Data, AI/ML & Analytics
job_description:
Canonical is a leading provider of open source software and operating systems to the global enterprise and technology markets. Our platform, Ubuntu, is very widely used in breakthrough enterprise initiatives such as public cloud, data science, AI, engineering innovation and IoT. Our customers include the world's leading public cloud and silicon providers, and industry leaders in many sectors. The company is a pioneer of global distributed collaboration, with 1000+ colleagues in 70+ countries and very few roles based in offices. Teams meet two to four times yearly in person, in interesting locations around the world, to align on strategy and execution.

The company is founder led, profitable and growing. We are hiring Python and Kubernetes Specialist Engineers focused on Data, AI/ML and Analytics Solutions to join our teams building open source solutions for public cloud and private infrastructure.

As a software engineer on the team, you'll collaborate on an end-to-end data analytics and mlops solution composed of popular, open-source, machine learning tools, such as Kubeflow, MLFlow, DVC, and Feast. You may also work on workflow, ETL, data governance and visualization tools like Apache SuperSet, dbt, and Temporal, or data warehouse solutions such as Apache Trino, or ClickHouse. Your team will own a solution from the analytics and machine learning space, and integrate with the solutions from other teams to build the world's best end-to-end data platform. These solutions may be run on servers or on the cloud, on machines or on Kubernetes, on developer desktops, or as web services.

We serve the needs of individuals and community members as much as the needs of our Global 2000 and Fortune 500 customers; we make our primary work available free of charge and our Pro subscriptions are also available to individuals for personal use at no cost. Our goal is to enable more people to enjoy the benefits of open source, regardless of their circumstances.

Location: This initiative spans many teams that are home-based and in multiple time zones. We believe in distributed collaboration but we also try to ensure that colleagues have company during their work hourse! Successful candidates will join a team where most members and your manager are broadly in the same time zone so that you have the benefits of constant collaboration and discussion.

What your day will look like
ï Develop your understanding of the entire Linux stack, from kernel, networking, and storage, to the application layer
ï Design, build and maintain solutions that will be deployed on public and private clouds and local workstations
ï Master distributed systems concepts such as observability, identity, tracing
ï Work with both Kubernetes and machine-oriented open source applications
ï Collaborate proactively with a distributed team of engineers, designers and product managers
ï Debug issues and interact in public with upstream and Ubuntu communities Generate and discuss ideas, and collaborate on finding good solutions

What we are looking for in you
ï Professional or academic software delivery using Python
ï Exceptional academic track record from both high school and university
ï Undergraduate degree in a technical subject or a compelling narrative about your alternative chosen path
ï Confidence to respectfully speak up, exchange feedback, and share ideas without hesitation
ï Track record of going above-and-beyond expectations to achieve outstanding results
ï Passion for technology evidenced by personal projects and initiatives
ï The work ethic and confidence to shine alongside motivated colleagues
ï Professional written and spoken English with excellent presentation skills
ï Experience with Linux (Debian or Ubuntu preferred)
ï Excellent interpersonal skills, curiosity, flexibility, and accountability
ï Appreciative of diversity, polite and effective in a multi-cultural, multi-national organisation
ï Thoughtfulness and self-motivation
ï Result-oriented, with a personal drive to meet commitmentsAbility to travel twice a year, for company events up to two weeks long

Additional Skills That Would Be Nice To Have

The following skills may be helpful to you in the role, but we don't expect everyone to bring all of them.
ï Hands-on experience with machine learning libraries, or tools.
ï Proven track record of building highly automated machine learning solutions for the cloud.
ï Experience with container technologies (Docker, LXD, Kubernetes, etc.)
ï Experience with public clouds (AWS, Azure, Google Cloud)
ï Working knowledge of cloud computing
ï Passionate about software quality and testing Experience working on an open source project

What we offer colleagues

We consider geographical location, experience, and performance in shaping compensation worldwide. We revisit compensation annually (and more often for graduates and associates) to ensure we recognise outstanding performance. In addition to base pay, we offer a performance-driven annual bonus or commission. We provide all team members with additional benefits, which reflect our values and ideals. We balance our programs to meet local needs and ensure fairness globally.
ï Distributed work environment with twice-yearly team sprints in person
ï Personal learning and development budget of USD 2,000 per year
ï Annual compensation review
ï Recognition rewards
ï Annual holiday leave
ï Maternity and paternity leave
ï Employee Assistance Programme
ï Opportunity to travel to new locations to meet colleagues Priority Pass, and travel upgrades for long haul company events

About Canonical

Canonical is a pioneering tech firm at the forefront of the global move to open source. As the company that publishes Ubuntu, one of the most important open source projects and the platform for AI, IoT and the cloud, we are changing the world of software. We recruit on a global basis and set a very high standard for people joining the company. We expect excellence - in order to succeed, we need to be the best at what we do. Most colleagues at Canonical have worked from home since its inception in 2004. Working here is a step into the future, and will challenge you to think differently, work smarter, learn new skills, and raise your game.

Canonical is an equal opportunity employer

We are proud to foster a workplace free from discrimination. Diversity of experience, perspectives, and background create a better work environment and better products. Whatever your identity, we will give your application fair consideration.

job_description:
Come join a team of industry and science leaders to achieve a vision of empowering innovation through state-of-the-art artificial intelligence and machine learning. We are addressing exciting challenges for our customers, at the intersection of AI/ML and cutting-edge cloud infrastructure, with NLP being a core area of what we do and what we offer our customers.

What You Would Do:
ï Provide scientific machine learning methodology leadership.
ï Use AI/ML to solve NLP tasks and hard challenges, primarily for internal projects (i.e. for our product offering) and also for external projects (e.g. for customer projects)
ï Build state-of-the-art models for cognitive services using various open source and machine learning principles and techniques (including but not limited to Classical Machine Learning such as logistic regression, SVM, NN, Clustering, and Deep Learning; including CNN, RNN, Transformer, Seq2Seq, BERT)
ï Brainstorm and design various POCs using ML/DL/NLP solutions for new or existing enterprise problems
ï Collaborate with fellow scientists and software engineers to build out various parts of our AI/ML infrastructure, services, and solutions, and effectively communicate the solutions to address external and internal shareholder's product challenges by presenting to highly technical audiences
ï Present effective, highly technical and complex solutions and architectures to audiences with limited or no experience in machine learning solutions
Your Minimum Qualifications Are:
ï Advanced degree (Ph.D. preferred, Masters accepted) in Computer Science, Physics, Electrical Engineering, Statistics or Mathematics, preferably with specialization in Artificial intelligence, Machine Learning, Speech Recognition, Natural Language Processing, Operations Research, or a related field
ï 7+ years of Industry experience in designing and implementing machine learning models at scale, with a track record of deploying them in large-scale production environments
ï Experience with any of the following: SotA attention models, Large Language Models (LLMs), Conversational AI, Virtual Assistants, Document Understanding, Spoken Language Understanding, Information Retrieval, Question/Answering or related fields
ï Experience in LLM reasoning, ACT, and ReACT methods
ï Experience in developing and debugging in Python, C/C++ or C#
ï Fluent in building models with Python and state-of-the-art machine learning libraries (e.g. PyTorch, Tensorflow, MxNet).
ï Experience or willingness to learn and work in Agile and iterative development and DevOps processes.
ï Ability to work with minimal supervision, keeping a strong alignment with your technical peers, non-technical partners, and the overall company objective.
ï You enjoy and thrive in a fast-working collaborative environment.

Preferred Qualifications:
ï A deep experience and understanding in Statistics, Mathematical models, Multivariate and DL algorithms
ï Experience in Machine Translation
ï Experience in Document Understanding
ï Reinforcement Learning with Human Feedback (RLHF)
ï Multimodal Deep Learning Models
ï An impressive Google Scholar portfolio
ï A strong track record in starting or contributing to open-source ML platforms, tools, and projects

job_description:
About Lucidya

Lucidya is a fast-growing SaaS company building AI-powered customer experience solutions for enterprises across the MENA region. Known for our deep expertise in Arabic-first AI, we help organizations understand, serve, and engage their customers at scale.

We are now launching a new AI Agents business unit, focused on building intelligent, enterprise-grade AI agents that automate, assist, and augment customer-facing and operational workflows - securely, responsibly, and at scale.

Role overview

As an AI Agent Engineer, you will be responsible for designing, building, and deploying intelligent AI agents that solve real business problems. You will work at the intersection of machine learning, deep learning, and production AI, turning advanced models into reliable, scalable systems used by enterprise customers.

This role goes beyond experimentation - you will help take AI from concept to production, ensuring performance, ethical compliance, and real-world impact.

What youíll do

AI & Agent Development
ï Design, develop, and optimize machine learning and deep learning models for AI agent use cases.
ï Build intelligent systems capable of reasoning, prediction, automation, and decision support.
ï Apply NLP, data analysis, and agentic workflows to solve complex CX and operational challenges.
Data & Model Engineering
ï Manage, clean, and preprocess large datasets to extract meaningful features.
ï Train, evaluate, and fine-tune machine learning models to meet performance and reliability standards.
ï Continuously monitor and improve model accuracy, robustness, and efficiency.
Production & Scalability
ï Deploy AI models into production environments with a focus on scalability, performance, and reliability.
ï Collaborate on MLOps practices to support continuous integration, monitoring, and improvement.
ï Ensure AI systems integrate smoothly with existing platforms and workflows.
Cross-Functional Collaboration
ï Work closely with data scientists, software engineers, product managers, and domain experts.
ï Translate business problems into effective AI solutions with measurable outcomes.
ï Contribute to solution design for enterprise pilots and long-term deployments.
Governance & Quality
ï Ensure AI solutions comply with ethical standards, data privacy requirements, and legal regulations.
ï Document models, algorithms, workflows, and decisions clearly for internal and external stakeholders.
ï Stay up to date with the latest AI research, tools, and best practices; and apply them where valuable.
Requirements

What weíre looking for

Technical skills
ï 2+ years of hands-on experience building and deploying AI-driven systems, with a strong focus on AI agents or agentic workflows, and demonstrated impact on real business outcomes (e.g. automation, efficiency gains, cost reduction, CX improvement).
ï Strong programming skills in Python (Java is a plus).
ï Hands-on experience with machine learning and deep learning techniques.
ï Practical experience using TensorFlow, PyTorch, or similar frameworks.
ï Solid understanding of data preprocessing, feature engineering, model training, and evaluation.
ï Experience deploying AI models into production or production-like environments.
Problem-solving & mindset
ï Ability to analyze complex problems and design innovative AI-driven solutions.
ï Strong systems thinking, understanding how models behave in real-world environments.
ï Curiosity and commitment to continuous learning in a fast-evolving AI landscape.
Collaboration & communication
ï Comfortable working in cross-functional, product-driven teams.
ï Able to clearly document and explain technical concepts to diverse stakeholders.
Nice to have
ï Experience with NLP, conversational AI, or agent-based systems.
ï Exposure to enterprise AI deployments or SaaS platforms.
ï Familiarity with MLOps, monitoring, and model lifecycle management.
ï Experience working with multilingual or Arabic language data.
Why join Lucidyaís AI Agents team?
ï Work on real, enterprise-grade AI agents, not just experiments.
ï Shape a new business unit from the ground up.
ï Solve meaningful CX and operational challenges across the MENA region.

job_title: Ai and Machine Learning Software Developer
job_description:
Design, develop, and implement AI and machine learning algorithms and models to solve complex problems and improve business processes.

Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills, with a keen attention to detail.
Effective communication skills, with the ability to collaborate with multidisciplinary teams and communicate technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.
Ability to work independently and manage multiple projects in a fast-paced environment.
Demonstrated passion for AI, ML, and emerging technologies, with a commitment to continuous learning and professional development

job_title: AI Engineer & Data Engineer ñ Internship
job_description:
We are offering an exciting internship opportunity for Saudi nationals to gain hands-on experience in Artificial Intelligence and Data Engineering. This role is ideal for candidates who are passionate about data, analytics, and AI technologies, and are eager to build a strong foundation in real-world projects.

Key Responsibilities:
ï Assist in developing and maintaining data pipelines (ETL/ELT) for structured and unstructured data.
ï Support data cleaning, preprocessing, and transformation activities.
ï Work with Python and SQL for data analysis and automation tasks.
ï Assist in building, training, and testing basic AI/ML models under guidance.
ï Support data visualization and reporting for business insights.
ï Collaborate with senior engineers and cross-functional teams on ongoing projects.
ï Document processes, code, and learnings as part of best practices.

Required Skills & Qualifications:
ï Saudi national (mandatory).
ï Currently pursuing (final year) or recently completed a degree in Computer Science, Data Science, AI, Engineering, or a related field.
ï Basic knowledge of Python and SQL.
ï Understanding of data concepts, databases, and data processing fundamentals.
ï Introductory knowledge of machine learning or AI concepts is a plus.
ï Familiarity with tools such as Pandas, NumPy, or any ML libraries is an advantage.
ï Strong analytical thinking and problem-solving skills.
ï Willingness to learn and adapt in a fast-paced environment.

Preferred (Good to Have):
ï Exposure to cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, or GCP).
ï Basic understanding of data visualization tools (Power BI, Tableau, or similar).
ï Knowledge of version control tools like Git.

What You Will Gain:
ï Practical exposure to AI and Data Engineering projects.
ï Mentorship from experienced professionals.
ï Opportunity to build a strong technical foundation.
ï Internship completion certificate and potential future opportunities based on performance.

Internship Duration: 6 months

Work Mode: Onsite / Hybrid (as per project and company policy)

Eligibility: Only Saudi nationals are eligible to apply.

Compensation: Paid internship

About the Company:

Founded in 2022, the company is dedicated to democratizing world-class, data-driven transformations for organizations of all sizes. We empower businesses to achieve sustainable competitive advantages by helping them become data-driven enterprises. Our mission focuses on simplifying complex solutions, building a knowledgeable customer community, and fostering strong partnerships. The company aims to make best-in-class data solutions accessible beyond traditional consulting models.

job_title: MEA Enterprise Sales Specialist, AI & ML
job_description:
As an Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Machine Learning (ML) Sales Consultant you will be the customer engagement lead ñ integral to our ìMaking AI Workî strategy. You will build a vision and a journey for realising that AI vision with the customer. Helping them demystify the hype in the AI area and establish credibility from the first meeting through the quality of questions you ask and relevant ideas/customer outcomes you share.

You focus on business value and quickly build relationships with customers and prospects. You are an energetic self-starter and an exceptional communicator, at all levels of the customers and your own organisation, with experience of building strong business relationships. You know how to allow a customer to stand in their own shoes for a time then build a vision of what better looks like with them combined with a strong business case that aligns with their priority measurements.

Youíre emotionally and socially intelligent and thrive in a competitive environment. You see the value of team-work and are quick to share new insights, messaging and anecdotes with the specialist and wider sales team for mutual benefit. You understand the value of story-telling that is easily understood and not overwhelming regardless of audience knowledge level.

What you'll do at UiPath
ï Own the AI/ML sales pipeline from a focus set of accounts in the Middle East
ï You will be working with G2K and big enterprise customers. Solution selling and managing
ï complex sales cycles with multiple stakeholders involved - both internally and at the
ï customer side
ï Highly structured mindset, approach and account planning skills
ï Continually update knowledge and be able to articulate our competitive differentiators from
ï both hyper-scalers and boutique AI/IDP competitors
ï Build relationships and joint go-to-market plans with key system integrators, technology
ï partners and delivery partners
ï Provide support to sales executives and sales leaders to prioritise focus accounts, based on
ï your experience and research, and contribute to overall account plans for broader Business
ï Automation Platform engagement.

What you'll bring to the team
ï A deep understanding of AI, ML and IDP markets and solutions
ï A proven ability to have a relevant point of view about AI that is valuable to customers
ï Ability to become productive quickly through a customised and practical induction process,
ï as well as operate in a dynamic environment as part of an exciting hyper-growth organization
ï Exceptional verbal and written communication skills in Arabic and English

Maybe you donít tick all the boxes aboveó but still think youíd be great for the job? Go ahead, apply anyway. Because we know that experience comes in all shapes and sizesóand passion canít be learned.

Many of our roles allow for flexibility in when and where work gets done. Depending on the needs of the business and the role, the number of hybrid, office-based and remote workers will vary from team to team. Applications are assessed on a rolling basis and there is no fixed deadline for this requisition. The application window may change depending on the volume of applications received or may close immediately if a qualified candidate is selected.

job_description:
Company Description

Tech for People Unlocks the Future

At Devoteam, we believe that technology, combined with strong human values, can actively drive change for the better. Discover how Tech for People is shaping the future, creating a positive impact on individuals and the world around us.

With over 25 years of passion for technology and a presence in 18+ countries across EMEA and beyond, we are committed to leveraging innovation, expertise, and human-centric values to make a difference.

Devoteam Culture & Values:

True innovation is born from a powerful culture, fused with meaningful values.

Culture:

Fair and courageous

Everyone is treated fairly ñ this fuels bravery. At Devoteam, we always make fair decisions. We listen and are willing to be challenged, taking courageous decisions as a result. We help our employees to progress at every step and congratulate those who deserve it.

Ambition and results

Ambition is nurtured at every step ñ this drives results. We are ambitious entrepreneurs with a taste for performance, growth and celebrating success. Commitments are always kept as we seek to achieve profitable growth to create value and employment. We aim to bring as much value as possible to our clients, at every touchpoint.

Learning and innovating

Curiosity and learning are at our core ñ this stimulates innovation. At Devoteam, we are curious. We learn and embrace innovation constantly to meet challenges and build partnerships of excellence.

Caring and sharing

A caring attitude is infused into our culture ñ this encourages sharing. We believe in the power of teams, we promote support and collaboration.

At Devoteam, we care about our teams and want to work in a positive, productive environment. We support the development of talent and careers,

Values:

1. Respect

2. Frankness

3. Passion

Knowing that success is the result of collaboration. Alone, we go faster, but together, we go further.

To know more about us, please visit: www.devoteam.com

Job Description

As a Senior Data Scientist\Machine Learning Engineer at Devoteam, you will be responsible for developing, implementing, and optimizing advanced data-driven algorithms, including classification, regression, recommender systems, and user segmentation models. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify opportunities for improvement and deliver impactful insights that drive business success

Key responsibilities :
ï Identifying relevant data sources for business needs.
ï Processing, cleansing, and Organising data into usable formats.
ï Conduct in-depth research and analysis on large datasets to uncover hidden patterns, correlations, and trends
ï Apply data mining techniques such as association rule discovery, classification, and clustering
ï Conduct thorough EDA to understand underlying patterns, correlations, and anomalies in complex datasets
ï Transform and preprocess raw data to create meaningful features that can improve model performance.
ï Develop, evaluate, and deploy predictive machine learning models to drive actionable insights.
ï Communicate complex data findings in a clear and concise manner to non-technical stakeholders
ï Stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in data science, machine learning, and industry best practices, continuously seeking opportunities to improve methodologies and processes.
ï Advanced Technical Skills: Mastery of programming languages like Python or R, expertise in data manipulation, machine learning algorithms, and statistical analysis.
ï Data Manipulation:** Proficiency in working with large datasets, data cleaning, preprocessing, and transforming data into usable formats.
ï Machine Learning Expertise:** Experience in selecting and implementing appropriate machine learning algorithms, model evaluation, hyperparameter tuning, and dealing with bias and fairness issues.
ï Build conversational AI applications.

Qualifications
ï Bachelorís degree in Computer Engineering, IT or equivalent
ï + 7 year experience within the data science field.
ï Has a strong knowledge and proven experience in following areas: SQL, statistics , machine learning and programming
ï Strong expertise in various supervised and unsupervised machine learning algorithms such as Time Series Forecasting ,regression ,Clustering,Classification and deep learning methods
ï Experience working with Agile methodologies
ï Ability to communicate with both technical and non-technical audiences
ï Excellent English and Arabic communication skills (written & spoken)
ï Analytical mindset and Problem-solving skills
ï Alteryx or Dataiku experience is a must
ï MLOps experience is a plus
ï Practical Knowledge of big data systems is a plus

Additional Information

BU: Data Intelligence

Senio Level

NVIDIAís deep learning platform has already made a major impact on the field and is broadly used across leading academic and governmental institutions, start-ups, and industry, including the worldís largest Internet companies. Our success has been based on laser-focused industry vertical business development, building a strong developer ecosystem and scaling out the business using a partner channel and creative marketing. We need passionate, hard-working and creative people to help us pursue more of these rare opportunities in different industries. This Solutions Architect role is for an expert trusted technical advisor and leader to our customers who believes that deep learning, data science, and artificial intelligence is a new computing revolution and has the potential to transform their businesses.

For our offices in DUBAI and SAUDI, we are now looking for Solutions Architects, AI specialists, best-in-class engineers able to engage with developers, researchers, and start-ups, in multiple, impactful Deep Learning projects and help them build and automate large GPU infrastructures. We need individuals who can enable customer productivity and develop positive relationships with our technology partners, making NVIDIA an integral part of end-user solutions.

What youíll be doing:
ï Assisting field business development in guiding the customer build/extend their GPU infrastructures for AI.
ï Help customers build their large scale projects especially LLM projects.
ï Engage with customers to develop a keen understanding of their data centers and technical needs ñ and help integrate our GPU ecosystem in their existing environments.
ï You will strategically partner with lighthouse customers and industry-specific hardware infrastructures and other solution partners targeting our computing platform.
ï Be an internal champion and help improve the NVIDIA GPU systems provisioning tools and automation software for Deep Learning and HPC among the NVIDIA technical community.

What we need to see:
ï MS or PhD in Engineering, Mathematics, Physics, or Computer Science (or equivalent experience).
ï 3+ years of work related experience in AI and software development for Machine learning familiarity with LLM and Generative AI is highly desirable.
ï Deep understanding of operating systems, computer networks, High Performance Applications and Deep Learning frameworks (Tensorflow, CNTK, Pytorch etc).
ï Familiarity with resource scheduling managers (Slurm (preferred), LSF, etc).
ï Demonstrated ability to script in bash and python.
ï Experience working with orchestration technologies like Kubernetes.
ï Exposure to GPU Computing and CUDA programming.
ï Experience working with supercomputing and technical computing customers.
ï Capable of working in a rapidly changing environment without losing focus.
ï Ability to multitask effectively in a dynamic environment.
ï Strong analytical and problem solving skills.
ï Strong time-management and organization skills for coordinating multiple initiatives, priorities and implementations of new technology and products into very complex projects.
ï Excellent written and oral communications skills with the ability to effectively collaborate with management and engineering.

Ways to stand out from the crowd:
ï Experience working with large GPU installations.
ï Background with Large Language Models and NLP, Generative AI and Foundation Models.
ï Experience with Large scale inferencing.
ï Experience with NVIDIA software for cluster management and provisioning such as nvsm, dcgm and
ï Specialty skills in large scale computing and cluster computing, datacenter design.

NVIDIA is widely considered to be one of the technology worldís most desirable employers. We have some of the most brilliant and talented people in the world working for us. If you're creative and autonomous, we want to hear from you!

job_description:
Description

This role aims to design, implement, and maintain scalable, secure, and reliable MLOps infrastructure and CI/CD pipelines to enable rapid and high-quality delivery of machine learning models and data-driven services to production. The role bridges ML/Development and Operations, driving automation, reliability, monitoring, and operational excellence across environments.

Key responsibilities
ï Build and operate end-to-end pipelines for training, validation, packaging, and deployment across dev/test/prod.
ï Implement CI/CD for code, data, and model artifacts with quality gates, approvals, and rollbacks.
ï Deploy and scale ML services using Docker and Kubernetes (real-time and batch), with safe rollout strategies.
ï Set up model registry and experiment tracking and enforce reproducible, versioned releases (e.g., MLflow or equivalent).
ï Implement monitoring and alerting for service health, latency, errors, resource usage, plus ML signals (drift, data quality, model performance).
ï Define operational standards (SLIs/SLOs, incident response, RCA, runbooks) and continuously improve reliability.
ï Enforce security best practices (IAM/RBAC, secrets management, network controls, audit logging) and collaborate with DS/ML/Data teams.

Requirements
ï 3ñ7 years in MLOps/DevOps/Platform roles with production ML exposure.
ï Strong CI/CD and automation skills, solid Python and Linux knowledge, strong troubleshooting abilities.
ï Hands-on experience with Docker and Kubernetes and observability tools (Prometheus/Grafana, ELK, OpenTelemetry or similar).

Job Title:
Senior Machine Learning Operations Engineer

Location:
Raleigh, NC, Norcross, GA or Remote (Eastern Time zone)

Reports To:
Sr. Director of Technology and Architecture

Position Overview

We're looking for a Senior
MLOps Engineer
to architect and build our production ML infrastructure from the ground up. You'll be responsible for designing and implementing a multi-tenant platform that enables our data science team to deploy machine learning models at scale across multiple wastewater utility customers. This is a foundational role where you'll establish the patterns, practices, and infrastructure that will support dozens of production models serving critical utility operations.

Key Responsibilities
ï Design and implement multi-tenant ML model serving infrastructure that supports customer isolation, monitoring, and cost allocation.
ï Build CI/CD pipelines for automated model training, testing, validation, and deployment.
ï Establish data quality frameworks including validation, drift detection, and monitoring at scale.
ï Create model versioning, A/B testing, and rollback capabilities for production deployments.
ï Collaborate closely with data scientists to establish workflows that enable independent model deployment while maintaining quality and consistency.
ï Implement observability and monitoring systems for model performance, data quality, and infrastructure health.
ï Design and document architectural patterns and best practices for the ML platform.
ï Optimize infrastructure costs across multiple customer deployments.
ï Ensure security, compliance, and data isolation requirements are met in multi-tenant architecture.
ï Bridge the gap between pilot/proof-of-concept systems and production-ready infrastructure.

Qualifications
ï 5-8+ years of experience in MLOps, DevOps, or ML infrastructure engineering.
ï Proven experience architecting and building ML platforms from scratch (0?1), not just maintaining existing systems.
ï Deep understanding of multi-tenant architecture patterns, including data isolation, security, and cost optimization.
ï Strong experience with containerization (Docker, Kubernetes) and orchestration for ML workloads.
ï Hands-on experience with at least one major cloud platform (AWS, Azure, or GCP) for production ML deployment.
ï Experience designing and implementing CI/CD pipelines for ML models.
ï Strong knowledge of data quality monitoring, model drift detection, and observability practices.
ï Proficiency in Python and infrastructure-as-code tools (Terraform, CloudFormation, etc.).
ï Experience working with Python ML Stack: pytorch, scikit-learn, numpy, and pandas
ï Experience working closely with data scientists to enable their productivity and independence.
ï Excellent communication skillsóable to explain architectural decisions and tradeoffs to both technical and business stakeholders.
ï Bonus points for experience in:
ï Experience in time-series data, SCADA systems, or edge computing.
ï Previous experience scaling ML systems from pilots to hundreds of production deployments.
ï Familiarity with water/wastewater utility operations or industrial control systems.

As a Generative Artificial Intelligence (AI) Specialist, you will work with Product Development and Technical Business teams as an Generative AI subject matter expert to bring Google Cloud AI products to customers and partners.
In this role, you will help prospective customers and partners understand the power of Google AI, explaining technical features, helping customers design architectures, build AI powered applications, and problem-solving any potential roadblocks. You will also have the opportunity to help customers leverage Google Cloudís Generative AI services, including Large Language Models and specialized Machine Learning (ML) hardware developed by Google, called Tensor Processing Unit.

Position: AI Team Lead / AI Technical Manager

Lucidya is on the forefront of innovation in artificial intelligence and is looking for a skilled AI Manager to oversee our AI programs and initiatives. In this key role, you will lead a dedicated team of machine learning/AI engineers, managing the development and implementation of AI technologies that enhance our offerings and drive business success.

As an AI Manager within our AI Agent Team, you will be key in developing a new flagship product from the ground up. This role will allow you to demonstrate a 'starter' mindset while nurturing both the product and the team. You will have the chance to exhibit your comprehensive skill set, including both soft and technical abilities. Experience in building AI Agents is essential.

This position provides an exciting opportunity for an individual with a strong background in AI/ML technologies and leadership skills to make a significant impact within the organization. If you're passionate about pushing the boundaries of AI and building a new solution, we encourage you to apply.
ï Education:
ï Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, or a related field; a Master's degree is preferred.
ï Experience:
ï 5+ years of experience in AI/ML, along with 2+ years in a managerial or leadership role.
ï Experience with the full machine learning lifecycle, from data gathering to model deployment.
ï Strong Practical Experience in building and deploying AI Agents

Skills:

ï Strong understanding of AI concepts and technologies, particularly in MLOps.

ï Soft Skills:

ï Strategic and critical thinking
ï Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities.
ï Effective communication and interpersonal skills that enable cross-functional collaboration.

ï Other:
ï Passion for continuous learning and staying abreast of advancements in AI technologies.
ï Ability to manage multiple projects and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment.
ï Ability to thrive in a start-up and adaptable environment.

Why Join Us?

This is more than just an engineering roleóitís an opportunity to shape the technical future of Lucidya and its Customers
. Youíll play a key part in scaling our platform, building a strong engineering culture, and delivering technology that empowers companies across the region and beyond.

We offer Employee Stock Option Plans (ESOP) to give you ownership in the companyís success, along with performance-based bonuses to reward your impact and dedication. As part of a fast-growing team, youíll have the autonomy to lead, innovate, and growóboth personally and professionally.
#J-18808-Ljbffr

We're Not Hiring. We're Building a Movement.

ThakaaMed is Saudi Arabia's leading healthcare AI company. We're building Super Healthcare Intelligence ó AI that detects 100+ dental conditions, chest abnormalities, strokes, and retinal diseases in seconds.

2.5 billion people lack access to quality diagnostics. We're changing that.

Now we're looking for a
Senior AI Healthcare Engineer
to join as the senior technical leader in a team of 2 AI engineers. This isn't a job. It's equity in a company powering Vision 2030.

THE ROLE

You'll work directly with the C-suite to:

? Architect our IQ Platform (Dental IQ, Chest IQ, Stroke IQ, Retina IQ)

? Understand healthcare integrations (HL7, FHIR, DICOM, PACS) that plug AI into clinical workflows

? Develop computer vision models using PyTorch, MONAI, and custom architectures

? Optimize inference pipelines ó GPU acceleration, distributed computing, edge deployment

? Mentor the next generation of healthcare AI engineers

? Ship medical devices deployed across Saudi Arabia, UAE, Egypt, and Morocco

THE PLAYGROUND

We don't talk about cutting-edge tech. We own it.

? NVIDIA GPUs with NVLink

? Proprietary data center in Riyadh ó your models, your data, your control

? PyTorch, MONAI, Docker/K8s, 10Gbps networking

? Access to diverse, properly labeled medical imaging datasets

? Fully funded. Zero cloud lock-in. Zero bureaucracy.

YOU BRING

? 7+ years shipping production AI/ML systems (healthcare/medical imaging preferred)

? Deep expertise in computer vision ó CNNs, transformers, segmentation architectures

? Production HL7, FHIR, DICOM experience (you know theory vs implementation)

? Python mastery. Bonus: Rust, systems optimization

? Track record leading technical teams

? Fluent English (Arabic a plus)

? Willingness to be in or relocate to Riyadh

Bonus points:

? Publications (NeurIPS, MICCAI, CVPR)

? Open-source contributions (MONAI, OHIF)

? Regulatory experience (SFDA, FDA 510(k), CE marking)

WHAT YOU EARN

? Competitive base salary ó market-leading for the region

? Equity participation ó own a piece of a company scaling to hundreds of millions SAR

? Performance bonuses tied to technical milestones

? Relocation support for exceptional candidates

? Direct executive access ó your ideas reach decision-makers in hours, not months

LOCATION

Riyadh, Saudi Arabia. Remote start possible for exceptional candidates.

THE BIGGER PICTURE

Saudi Arabia is investing $20B+ into healthcare transformation. ThakaaMed is at the center ó partnering with the Ministry of Health, SFDA, and major hospitals to build the AI infrastructure for the next generation of care.

16-person team growing to 35. Small enough to matter. Big enough to scale.

This is your chance to jin one of the most disruptive companies in the region.

Ready?

ThakaaMed is committed to diversity and inclusion. All qualified candidates are encouraged to apply.

A leading data analytics firm is seeking a Senior Data Engineer to design and implement scalable data solutions. The ideal candidate will have strong skills in Python, cloud services, and data workflow management. This remote position requires collaboration across teams to enhance data-driven products and resolve data quality issues. Experience with machine learning and a relevant degree are essential.

## Full Description
The purpose of an AI engineer position is to design, develop, and implement artificial intelligence solutions to address complex problems and enhance processes within an organization. This role aims to leverage advanced algorithms, machine learning, and deep learning techniques to create intelligent systems that can analyze data, make predictions, and automate tasks. Ultimately, the AI engineer contributes to technological innovation, improves efficiency, and helps the organization stay competitive by harnessing the power of artificial intelligence in various applications, such as data analysis, image recognition, natural language processing, and more.

Requirements

ï Design and optimize machine learning algorithms for specific applications.

ï Manage and preprocess large datasets to extract relevant features for training AI models.

ï Train machine learning models and evaluate their performance through testing.

ï Use programming languages (e.g., Python, Java) for AI development.

ï Apply expertise in deep learning frameworks like TensorFlow or PyTorch to build and implement neural networks.

ï Work closely with cross-functional teams, including data scientists, software engineers, and domain experts.

ï Analyze complex problems and propose innovative AI solutions to address business challenges.

ï Stay updated on the latest advancements in AI and integrate new technologies into existing systems.

ï Ensure AI applications comply with ethical standards and legal regulations.

ï Prepare comprehensive documentation for algorithms, models, and processes.

ï Engage in ongoing learning to stay abreast of emerging technologies and industry trends.

ï Assist in deploying AI models into production environments, ensuring scalability and efficiency.

We are looking for a Data Scientist with strong expertise in Generative AI, NLP, and deep learning to build intelligent, data driven solutions.

The role focuses on developing LLM-powered applications, RAG-based systems, and advanced analytics models to solve complex business problems at scale.
Key Responsibilities
Design, develop, and deploy Generative AI and NLP solutions, including LLM fine-tuning and RAG-based architectures.
Analyze structured and unstructured data to extract insights and build predictive and generative models.
Build and maintain end-to-end ML pipelines, from data collection and feature engineering to model deployment and monitoring.
Apply advanced NLP techniques for text classification, summarization, question answering, entity recognition, and conversational AI.
Develop and manage embeddings and vector search pipelines for semantic retrieval and knowledge-based systems.
Evaluate model performance using appropriate metrics, perform error analysis, and iterate to improve accuracy and robustness.
Collaborate with product, engineering, and data teams to translate business requirements into data science solutions.
Communicate findings, model behavior, and insights clearly to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.
Stay current with emerging trends and research in Data Science, Generative AI, LLMs, and NLP.
Required Skills & Qualifications
Strong foundation in Data Science, Machine Learning, and Deep Learning.
Hands-on experience with Generative AI and LLM fine-tuning (e.g., prompt engineering, LoRA, PEFT).
Experience building RAG-based systems and working with unstructured text data.
Solid knowledge of NLP and transformer-based models (BERT, GPT, T5, LLaMA, etc.).
Proficiency in Python, along with ML/DL libraries such as PyTorch, TensorFlow, scikit-learn.
Experience with vector databases (FAISS, Pinecone, Weaviate, Milvus).
Strong skills in data analysis, model evaluation, and experimentation.
Familiarity with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, or GCP).
Strong analytical thinking and communication skills.
Good to Have
Experience with MLOps (model versioning, monitoring, CI/CD).
Knowledge of distributed computing or large-scale data processing.
Experience handling large, unstructured, or semi-structured datasets.
Understanding of AI ethics, bias detection, and responsible AI practices.

job_title: Senior / Staff MLOps Engineer (Bangkok based, relocation provided)
job_description:
About Agoda
At Agoda, we bridge the world through travel. Our story began in 2005, when two lifelong friends and entrepreneurs, driven by their passion for travel, launched Agoda to make it easier for everyone to explore the world.

Today, we are part of Booking Holdings [NASDAQ: BKNG], with a diverse team of over 7,000 people from 90 countries, working together in offices around the globe. Every day, we connect people to destinations and experiences, with our great deals across our millions of hotels and holiday properties, flights, and experiences worldwide.

No two days are the same at Agoda. Data and technology are at the heart of our culture, fueling our curiosity and innovation. If you're ready to begin your best journey and help build travel for the world, join us.

ML Platform in Agoda

Agoda ML and AI Platform is built on self-managed Kubernetes and powered by Kubeflow, an open-source solution that enables efficient machine learning workflows.

Our AI Ops team combines the best practices of software engineering with data science to help Machine Learning Engineers and Data Scientists work more effectively, meaning we aim to incorporate data/model versioning, collaboration, monitoring etc. in an intuitive way that allows our users to prosper within the field.

In This Role, You'll Get to
:
ï Lead the design, development, and implementation of on-premises MLOps solutions that support the delivery of machine learning models
ï Collaborate with data scientists and software engineers to build scalable and efficient data pipelines and model training and deployment systems
ï Develop and maintain monitoring and management tools to ensure the reliability and performance of our on-premises MLOps infrastructure
ï Work with stakeholders across the organization to understand their machine learning needs and requirements, and to develop MLOps solutions that meet those needs
ï Stay up-to-date with the latest trends and technologies in MLOps, LLMOps, machine learning, and artificial intelligence, and share your knowledge with the team to help us stay at the forefront of the field
ï Mentor junior members of the team and help them grow their skills and expertise in MLOps
ï Troubleshooting and debugging user issues

What You'll Need to Succeed:
ï 5+ years of experience in MLOps, Software engineering, Data engineering, or a related field
ï Strong programming skills in a modern programming language (Java, Scala, Python, Kotlin)
ï Excellent communication and collaboration skills, and the ability to work effectively in a team environment
ï Value code simplicity and performance

It's Great if you have:
ï Understanding of ML Projects lifecycle
ï Experience with MLOps platforms, such as Kubeflow or MLFlow
ï Experience with ML frameworks ñ like scikit-learn, LGBM, Tensorflow, PyTorch etc.
ï Experience with Big Data tools ñ Spark, S3, Hadoop
ï Strong knowledge of containerization and container orchestration technologies, such as Docker and Kubernetes
ï Experience with DevOps and CI/CD practices
ï Has experience building and scaling model serving tools, i.e building APIs with tight SLAs

Aramco seeking a brilliant and results-driven Generative AI Expert to join the Technology & Digital Coordination team within its HR & Corporate Services (HR&CS) business, and shape the future of technology in Corporate Services sector. HR&CSí business is a diverse and manpower-intensive organization with 15,000+ employees. Our suborganizations vary in nature, and include: Human Resources, Training & Development, Safety & Security, Government Affairs, Public Affairs, Community Services, Transportation (Marine, Aviation, etc.), and Medical Services Support.

As our AI Expert, you'll play a pivotal role in working with cross-functional teams to develop, implement and drive the HR&CS AI strategy.

Key Responsibilities
ï Define and implement the HR&CS AI roadmap, identifying opportunities for AI integration across the business line.
ï Work across organizations on the ideation, scoping and implementation of the best suited generative AI solutions to addresses their needs.
ï Advise and support stakeholders, applying generative AI methodologies within their business to improve performance and enable data-driven decision making.
ï Design and develop solutions that use generative AI, built on Machine Learning (ML) and Large Language Models (LLM), tailored to business need.
ï Fine-tune generative AI models using the most efficient algorithms, focusing on delivering optimal outcomes.
ï Build teams to develop and support generative AI, and upskill them as needed.
ï Work effectively with engineers, data scientists, product managers, and other stakeholders.

ï Continuously learn and stay current with the latest advancements in AI.

Minimum Requirements

ï Experience in designing and implementing Generative AI models.
ï Highly qualified in programming AI related languages like Python and other AI frameworks.
ï Highly understands deep learning architecture, machine learning, NLP and generative models.
ï Experience in dealing with data (data analysis, manipulation, processing and augmentation).
ï Excellent communication and collaboration skills. Ability to translate technical concepts in non-technical, presentable format.
ï Passion for innovation and a desire to make a real-world impact with AI.

Working environment

Our high-performing employees are drawn by the challenging and rewarding professional, technical and industrial opportunities we offer, and are remunerated accordingly.

At Aramco, our people work on truly world-scale projects, supported by investment in capital and technology that is second to none. And because, as a global energy company, we are faced with addressing some of the worldís biggest technical, logistical and environmental challenges, we invest heavily in talent development.

job_description:
## Full Description

About Our Team

We're a fast-paced environment where talented individuals collaborate to drive AI innovations and shape the future of restaurant management.

As our new Chief Artificial Intelligence Officer, you'll lead the charge in developing and deploying cutting-edge AI solutions.

Your Key Responsibilities

ï Develop and implement AI strategies aligned with our business objectives.

ï Stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in AI and machine learning.

ï Collaborate with cross-functional teams to drive AI initiatives forward.

ï Design, develop, and deploy scalable AI/ML models.

ï Optimize model performance, accuracy, and scalability.

ï Architect and optimize AI infrastructure, leveraging cloud and on-premises solutions.

ï Guide the adoption of AI frameworks, tools, and libraries for maximum efficiency.

ï Drive automation and efficiency in AI workflows, reducing time to production.

ï Enhance data pipelines and model training processes through close collaboration with data teams.

ï Integrate AI-driven solutions into user experiences with product teams.

ï Align AI initiatives with company goals through collaboration with business and strategy teams.

Your Requirements

ï Eight plus years of experience in AI/ML, software engineering, or related fields.

ï Strong background in AI, machine learning, deep learning, and NLP.

ï Hands-on experience with AI/ML frameworks.

ï Proficiency in Python, Java, or other relevant programming languages.

ï Experience deploying AI models in production at scale using cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP).

ï Solid understanding of MLOps, data pipelines, and distributed computing.

ï Strong problem-solving and decision-making skills.

ï Excellent communication and stakeholder management abilities.

ï Ability to drive AI adoption and innovation within a business context.

Why Join Us

ï Inclusive and diverse culture promoting innovation and flexibility.

ï Competitive compensation packages, including bonuses and shares.

ï Prioritization of personal development, offering regular training and an annual learning stipend.

ï Talented team working in multiple countries, gaining valuable experience in an exciting industry.

ï Autonomy, mentoring, and challenging goals creating incredible opportunities for both you and the company.

## Full Description

Job Title: Native Saudi Arabia Linguistic Projects
Join Sigma AI to work on various linguistic projects, using your language skills and cultural knowledge to contribute to the development of artificial intelligence.
What We Value:
ï Proactive professionals who thrive on challenges and value collaboration.
ï Individuals with empathy, integrity, and a passion for learning.
Responsibilities:
ï Categorization ñ Annotation ñ Correction ñ Transcription ñ Evaluation ñ Conversational interactions ñ Voice recording ñ Content creation ñ Localization ñ Validation of audio, video, images, sentences, or words.
Requirements:
ï Fluent in Hejazi, Najdi, and Gulf dialects ñ Able to listen and write correctly without spelling mistakes.
Preferred Skills:
ï Experience in data annotation or content rating.
ï Strong attention to detail.
Technical Requirements:
ï Computer: Minimum 4GB RAM, Microphone and webcam, Operating system: Windows 10 or higher, macOS 13 Ventura or higher.

How to Apply:
If you're interested, click 'APPLY FOR THIS JOB' and follow the instructions. After submitting your application, you will receive an email with the required tests to assess your qualifications.

Company

Qualcomm Middle East Information Technology Company LLC

Job Area

Engineering Group, Engineering Group > Software Engineering

General Summary

About Us

Qualcomm is enabling a world where everyone and everything can be intelligently connected.

You interact with products and technologies made possible by Qualcomm every day, including 5G-enabled smartphones that double as pro-level cameras and gaming devices, smarter vehicles and cities, and the technology behind the smart, connected factories that manufactured your latest purchase.
Qualcomm 5G and AI innovations are the power behind the connected intelligent edge.

You'll find our technologies behind and inside the innovations that deliver significant value across multiple industries and to billions of people every day.
About The Role

Qualcomm is leveraging its expertise in hardware-accelerated AI to bring powerful, energy-efficient generative AI and computer vision workloads to the Edge.

The Qualcomm Compute AISW team is developing several key technologies including a comprehensive hardware and software stack for deep learning inference acceleration.

We are seeking highly skilled and experienced AI/ML Engineer to enable latest SOTA models on Qualcomm Edge platforms to join our team in Saudi Arabia.

In this role, you'll serve as a trusted technical advisor and customer advocate, helping partners and clients unlock the full potential of advanced computing platforms, including CPUs, GPUs, NPUs, AI accelerators, and heterogeneous systems.

You will have a pre-and post-sales focus and will work with channel partners and their respective technical sales/delivery teams to drive adoption of Qualcomm's platform across the B2B market.
You will partner with OEM and Channel sales teams on strategic and regionally appropriate engagements.
You will be the voice of the customer back to Qualcomm product, engineering and marketing teams on feature enhancements.

Responsibilities Will Include

Assisting with the Execution of Qualcomm's Go-To-Market strategy across MEA region.
Supporting the Sales team through deep technical engagement with reseller & customer implementers and assisting with device evaluations, pilots and proof-of-concepts
Assisting with the technical sales enablement commercial channel sales teams.
Assisting with Windows on Snapdragon related issues and bugs that you and/or your enterprise customers identify

Act as a technical interface between Qualcomm and customers to capture, articulate, and translate product requirements for various mobile and compute SKUs into actionable engineering specifications.

Collaborate with OEMs/ODMs, ISVs, and ecosystem partners to ensure successful integration of Snapdragon compute platforms across hardware, firmware, and software layers.
Drive end-to-end product development, from early architecture definition and bring-up to final system validation and commercial launch.

Analyse system performance and power efficiency; identify optimization opportunities to achieve the full potential of Snapdragon-powered laptops including compatibility, app performance, connectivity, and feature enablement.
Support customers in resolving complex hardware/software integration issues and provide technical guidance on reference designs, SDKs, and BSPs.
Guide customers through the evaluation and integration of platforms such as SoCs, AI/ML accelerators, and server-grade CPUs/GPUs/NPUs.
Represent Qualcomm in technical discussions and reviews with partners, demonstrating deep technical understanding and effective communication.
Lead product demos, technical workshops, and training sessions to showcase compute technologies and best practices.
Coordinate with Qualcomm global teams (engineering, product management, and customer engineering) to align roadmap priorities and technical support plans.
Collect and share customer feedback to help shape product roadmaps and drive continuous improvement.
Create and maintain technical documentation, application notes, and reference designs.
Stay up to date with the latest trends in high-performance computing, AI/ML, and edge/cloud architectures.

Required Qualifications

Bachelor's degree in Engineering, Information Systems, Computer Science, or related field or 5+ years of Computer Science or related work experience.
Very strong in C/C++/Python programming and algorithm development.
Experience with at least one AIML framework like TensorFlow, ONNX, Pytorch, etc.
Windows development experience. Experience with embedded systems development or equivalent.
Understanding of software development and debugging in embedded environments.
Understanding of AI/ML workloads
Strong problem-solving and diagnostic abilities
Ability to work in high-pressure environments and respond to incidents quickly
Strong attention to detail with a focus on quality and reliability
Willingness to work shifts, on-call rotations and sometimes in physically demanding conditions
Familiarity with Windows, Linux, bare-metal and virtualization platforms
Commitment to ongoing learning and professional development
Software design/debugging techniques, problem solving, and documentation skills.

Strong understanding of Qualcomm Snapdragon platforms and compute architectures including CPU, GPU, NPU and supporting software stacks (drivers, libraries, frameworks).
Proven ability to work directly with OEMs/ODMs and ISVs to deliver complex, multi-component systems.
Excellent skills in system debugging, performance profiling tools, benchmarking methodologies and cross-functional coordination.
Strong communication skills with a customer-first mindset; able to translate complex technical details into business-oriented discussions and customer-facing insights.
Willingness to travel for customer meetings and industry events.

Preferred Qualifications & Experience

Technical sales management expertise, the ability to manage change and the desire to operate effectively across organizations and customers
Experience building complex solutions and driving new device adoption with resellers & distributors.
Experience in support of launching new technologies/products
Ability to communicate, educate and evangelize both internally & externally
Prior experience in a customer engineering, field application, or technical program management role.
Understanding of cloud-to-edge AI enablement, on-device inference, or performance tuning on Snapdragon platforms.
Experience with system integration tools, BSP customization, and cross-platform testing.
Understanding about Processor architecture, system design fundamentals
Ability to collaborate across a globally diverse team and multiple interests
Batchelors or Masters degree with AI/ML as part of the course is a plus

Why Join Qualcomm

At Qualcomm, you'll be part of a global team that's defining the future of connected computing.

You will engage directly with world-leading OEMs and ecosystem partners to shape the next generation of AI-ready laptops and mobile devices ó enabling users to experience the full power of Snapdragon technology.
What's On Offer

Apart from working with great people, we offer the below:

Salary including housing & transport allowance
Stock (RSU's) and performance related bonus
16 weeks fully paid Maternity Leave
6 weeks fully paid Paternity Leave
Employee stock purchase scheme
Child Education Allowance
Relocation and immigration support (if needed)
Life and Medical Insurance
Live+ Well Reimbursement for health and recreational membership fees

Minimum Qualifications

Bachelor's degree in Engineering, Information Systems, Computer Science, or related field and 4+ years of Software Engineering or related work experience.
OR

Master's degree in Engineering, Information Systems, Computer Science, or related field and 3+ years of Software Engineering or related work experience.
OR

PhD in Engineering, Information Systems, Computer Science, or related field and 2+ years of Software Engineering or related work experience.

job_title: Senior AI Engineer (Agentic Systems & Inference) - Onsite
job_description:
## Full Description
As a Senior AI Engineer, you will be the primary architect of Cognnaís autonomous agent reasoning engine and the high-scale inference infrastructure that powers it. You are responsible for building production-grade reasoning systems that proactively plan, use tools, and collaborate. You will own the full lifecycle of our specialized security models, from domain-specific fine-tuning to architectingdistributed, high-throughput inference services that serve as Security-core intelligence in our platform.

Key Responsibilities

1. Agentic Architecture & Multi-Agent Coordination

ï Autonomous Orchestration: Design stateful, multi-agent systems using frameworks like Google ADK.

ï Protocol-First Integration: Architect and scale MCP servers and A2A interfaces, ensuring a decoupled and extensible agent ecosystem.

ï Cognitive Optimization: Develop lean, high-reasoning microservices for deep reasoning, optimizing context token usage to maintain high planning accuracy with minimal latency.

2. Model Adaptation & Performance Engineering

ï Specialized Fine-Tuning: Lead the architectural strategy for fine-tuning open-source and proprietary models on massive cybersecurity-specific telemetry.

ï Advanced Training Regimes: Implement Quantization-Aware Training (QAT) and manage Adapter-based architectures to enable the dynamic loading of task-specific specialists without the overhead of full-model swaps.

ï Evaluation Frameworks: Engineer rigorous, automated evaluation harnesses (including Human annotations and AI-judge patterns) to measure agent groundedness and resilience against the Security Engineerís adversarial attack trees.

3. Production Inference & MLOps at Scale

ï Distributed Inference Systems: Architect and maintain high-concurrency inference services using engines like vLLM, TGI, or TensorRT-LLM.

ï Infrastructure Orchestration: Own the GPU/TPU resource management strategy.

ï Observability & Debugging: Implement deep-trace observability for non-deterministic agentic workflows, providing the visibility needed to debug complex multi-step reasoning failures in production.

4. Advanced RAG & Semantic Intelligence

ï Hybrid Retrieval Architectures: Design and optimize RAG pipelines involving graph-like data structures, agent-based knowledge retrieval and semantic searches.

ï Memory Management: Architect episodic and persistent memory systems for agents, allowing for long-running security investigations that persist context across sessions.

ï Experience & Education: 5-7+ years in AI/ML Engineering or Backend Systems. Must have contributed to large-scale AI/ML inference service in production. M.S. or B.S. in Computer Science/AI is preferred.

ï Inference Orchestration: KV-cache management, quantization formats like AWQ/FP8, and distributed serving across multi-node GPU clusters).

ï Agentic Development: Expert in building autonomous systems using Google ADK/Langgraph/Langchain and experienced with AI Observervability frameworks like LangSmith or Langfuse. Hands-on experience building AI applications with MCP and A2A protocols.

ï Cloud AI Native: Proficiency in Google Cloud (Vertex AI), including custom training pipelines, high-performance prediction endpoints, and the broader MLOps suite.

ï Programming: Python and experience with high-performance backends (Go/C++) for inference optimization. You are comfortable working in a Kubernetes-native environment.

ï CI/CD: You are comfortable working in a Kubernetes-native environment.

?? Competitive Package ñ Salary + equity options + performance incentives

?? Flexible & Remote ñ Work from anywhere with an outcomes-first culture

?? Team of Experts ñ Work with designers, engineers, and security pros solving real-world problems

?? Growth-Focused ñ Your ideas ship, your voice counts, your growth matters

?? Global Impact ñ Build products that protect critical systems and data

About Deloitte:

When you work for us, you commit to a career at one of the largest and most prestigious professional services firms in the world.

We have received numerous awards over the last few years, including Best Employer in the Middle East, and Best Consulting Firm, and the Middle East Training & Development Excellence Award.
Our Purpose

Deloitte makes an impact that matters. Every day we challenge ourselves to do what matters mostófor clients, for our people, and for society. We serve clients distinctively, bringing innovative insights, solving complex challenges and unlocking sustainable growth.

We inspire our talented professionals to deliver outstanding value to clients, providing an exceptional career experience and an inclusive and collaborative culture.

We contribute to society, building confidence and trust in the markets, upholding the integrity of organizations and supporting our communities.
Our shared values guide the way we behave to make a positive, enduring impact:

Lead the way

data frameworks (Spark, Databricks).

end solution design.

quality artefacts (analysis reports, dashboards, model documentation) and ensure solutions are operationalized and adopted.
technical stakeholders using dashboards and executive summaries.

market activities.

suite and technical leadership.

end delivery from requirements and PoC to deployment and monitoring.

oriented environment and flexible work hours.

## Full Description

Job Summary

As an Artificial Intelligence Specialist, you will play a critical role in driving innovation and digital transformation within our organization. You will lead a multidisciplinary team to develop and implement AI-powered solutions that improve operational efficiency, enhance safety, and reduce costs.

With a strong background in machine learning, data analytics, and software development, you will collaborate with cross-functional teams to design, develop, and deploy AI solutions that meet our business needs. Your expertise will enable us to make data-driven decisions, identify new business opportunities, and stay ahead of the competition.

Key Responsibilities

ï Lead a team of engineers and developers to design, develop, and deploy AI-powered solutions.

ï Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify business needs and develop AI solutions that meet those needs.

ï Develop and maintain relationships with vendors and partners to source AI technologies and services.

ï Provide technical guidance and support to colleagues to ensure the effective use of AI technologies.

ï Stay up-to-date with emerging trends and developments in AI and adapt our strategies accordingly.

Requirements

ï Master's degree in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, or a related field.

ï Minimum 5 years of experience in developing and deploying AI-powered solutions.

ï Proven track record of successfully leading teams and delivering complex projects.

ï Expertise in machine learning, natural language processing, and computer vision.

ï Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.

Company Description

Solutyics strives to shape a world where Data and AI unlock limitless possibilities. With a dedicated team of technology experts, we focus on delivering cutting-edge solutions in AI, Machine Learning, Data Engineering, and Advanced Data Analytics. Our client-centric approach ensures that we deeply understand and cater to the specific needs of each client, helping them overcome challenges and achieve sustainable success. We prioritize building strong relationships founded on trust, integrity, and a mutual drive for success.

Role Description

This is a full-time on-site role based in Riyadh for an ML Ops Engineer. The responsibilities include managing and optimizing Machine Learning pipelines, model deployment, and monitoring ML operations in production environments. The role also involves troubleshooting issues, ensuring system reliability, and collaborating with cross-functional teams to improve ML infrastructure. You will work closely with data engineers and data scientists to enhance scalability and performance of AI/ML workflows.

Qualifications
ï Strong Analytical Skills and the ability to solve complex problems effectively
ï Proficiency in Troubleshooting and providing solutions to technical challenges
ï Experience with Linux and Windows operating systems in a production environment
ï Excellent Customer Service skills and the ability to collaborate effectively with teams
ï Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Data Science, Information Technology, or a related field is preferred
ï Familiarity with cloud platforms and tools for machine learning pipelines is a plus

Canonical's Device Delivery Team works with tier-1 OEM and ODM customers to pre-load Ubuntu Desktop and Ubuntu Core, bringing Ubuntu directly to millions of users.

This fast-paced environment requires excellent time management, deep knowledge of the Linux system , low-level debugging, critical thinking, problem-solving skills and management ability.

Maximise the results of team members and support their career growth
Coordinate with project managers, HWE, QA and certification management
Monitor projects from kickoff to post-mortem and handle escalations
Communicate, understand, and resolve the technical challenge with OEMs, ODMs, SiPs, IHVs
Prioritize customer requests globally
Collaborate with product engineering teams (including Desktop, Foundations, Kernel, and Security)
Provide leadership for methodologies, strategies, standards, tools, and best practices
Must be able to travel to the EU, USA, China, and Taiwan

Required Skills And Experience

A Bachelor (or higher) degree in STEM, preferably computer science or software engineering
Proven track record in technical roles with Linux, preferably Ubuntu or Debian
Commitment to development and testing methodologies, and maintainable code quality
Experience with management responsibilities
Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment
Ability to be productive in a globally distributed team through self-discipline and self-motivation
Commitment and energy to deliver on schedule
Strong English and Chinese language communication skills, both written and verbal

Desirable Skills And Experience

Making technical decisions for a team as a tech lead
Software architecture and design experience
Software development or operations experience with: Ubuntu - kernel and userspace, deb/snap packaging, QEMU/KVM, LXC/LXD, Containers, Python, Go, C, bash, Postgresql, Mongo, Kubernetes, OpenStack, Ceph, AI/ML
Participation in open-source development projects
Experience with CI/CD

## Full Description

Essential Responsibilities and Duties
Designs, builds, and implements AI and machine learning applications tailored to business needs and operational environments

Works closely with stakeholders, software engineers, and data scientists to understand requirements and translate them into AI-driven solutions.

Monitors the performance and effectiveness of implemented AI solutions, providing insights for ongoing optimization and strategic decision-making.

## Full Description

POSITION OBJECTIVE
We are seeking an experienced and strategic AI Manager to lead our artificial intelligence initiatives. You will oversee the development and implementation of AI/ML models, manage a team of data scientists and engineers, and collaborate with cross-functional stakeholders to integrate AI into business solutions. The ideal candidate has a strong background in data science, machine learning, and project management, along with proven leadership skills.
Key Responsibilities :
ï Lead and manage a team of AI/ML engineers, data scientists, and analysts.
ï Define AI strategies and roadmaps aligned with business goals.
ï Oversee the end-to-end development and deployment of AI models.
ï Collaborate with product, engineering, and business teams to identify AI opportunities.
ï Monitor and evaluate AI model performance and ensure continuous improvement.
ï Ensure compliance with ethical, regulatory, and data privacy standards.
ï Stay up to date on industry trends, tools, and techniques in AI and ML.
ï Manage project timelines, budgets, and resources effectively.
ï Develop internal capabilities through training, mentoring, and hiring.
Required Qualifications :
ï Bachelorís or Masterís degree in Computer Science, Data Science, Engineering, or related field (Ph.D. is a plus).
ï 5+ years of experience in AI/ML, with at least 2 years in a leadership or managerial role.
ï Strong understanding of machine learning, deep learning, NLP, and data analytics.
ï Hands-on experience with tools and frameworks such as Python, TensorFlow, PyTorch, Scikit-learn, etc.
ï Experience in cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP) and MLOps.
ï Excellent project management and communication skills.
ï Strong problem-solving skills and business acumen.
Preferred Qualification :
ï Experience in [industry-specific AI applications] (e.g., finance, healthcare, manufacturing).
ï Familiarity with GenAI (Generative AI), LLMs, and responsible AI practices.
ï Certifications in AI/ML or cloud platforms.
Benefit :
