ï Collaborate with the internal team to analyze user requirements to define the business objectives.
ï Improve system features and functionality.
ï Ensure application designs conform with business goals.
ï Identify and resolve any technical issues arising.
ï Create detailed design documentation, and documentation to help users.
ï Develop & propose changes to the current Java infrastructure.
ï Perform the quality tests for all process stages.
ï Prepare and produce releases of software components.
ï Perform continuous testing, and improvement, investigating alternatives and technologies, and presenting for reviews.

Required Skills and Qualifications:
ï Proven experience as a Full-Stack Developer with strong Java knowledge.
ï Experience with back-end technologies (Java, Spring Boot, RESTful APIs).
ï Proven experience in designing, developing, and maintaining backend systems.
ï Proficiency in front-end technologies (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and frameworks like Angular, React, or Vue.js).
ï Cloud Management: Specialist in managing iCloud Servers or similar cloud platforms.

job_title: Senior QA Engineer; Full-Stack: Backend & Mobile
job_description:
Position: Senior QA Engineer (Full-Stack: Backend & Mobile)

Tabby creates financial freedom in the way people shop, earn and save by reshaping their relationship with money. Over 15?million users choose Tabby to stay in control of their spending and make the most out of their money.

The companyís flagship offering allows shoppers to split their payments online and in?store with no interest or fees. Over 40?000 global brands and small businesses, including Amazon, Noon, IKEA, and SHEIN use Tabby to accelerate growth and gain loyal customers by offering easy and flexible payments online and in stores.

Tabby generates over $10?billion in annual transaction volume for its partner brands and is the highest?rated, most?reviewed, largest, and fastest?growing Fin Tech in the GCC region.

Tabby launched in 2019 and has since raised +$1?billion in equity and debt funding from global and regional investors, and is now valued at $3.3?billion.

We are looking for a Senior QA Engineer to own the quality of Tabbyís new credit product that is part of our mobile application and is powered by a microservice?based fintech platform. You would design the testing strategy, perform hands?on mobile and backend testing, and build the automation and monitoring needed to launch a reliable product quickly.

Department: B2C Financial Services, Engineering

Employment Type: Full Time

Location: Remote

Reporting To: Slava Slutsker
Key Responsibilities:
ï End-to-end ownership of product quality for a new credit product inside Tabbyís mobile app
ï Manual testing of mobile applications (iOS/Android) and backend services in a microservice architecture
ï Design and implement automated test suitesóunit, integration, API, and end-to-endócovering both mobile app and backend
ï Define and maintain QA processes and standards, introducing best practices for test planning, execution, and reporting
ï Collaborate closely with developers, product managers, and designers to ensure testability and early detection of issues
ï Drive continuous improvement of release quality, deployment pipelines, and overall developer productivity
ï Investigate and troubleshoot production issues, contributing to root?cause analysis and long?term fixes
What youíll bring:
ï 5+ years of professional QA experience, including at least 2 years working with mobile apps and backend services
ï Strong background in manual testing of mobile applications (iOS and Android)
ï Experience testing backend APIs and microservice architecture
ï Proficiency in test automation frameworks (e.g., Playwright, Cypress, Appium, or similar) and scripting languages
ï Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines, containerized environments (Docker/Kubernetes), and cloud platforms
ï Solid understanding of monitoring and observability tools (e.g., Prometheus, Grafana, Datadog, New Relic) and setting up alerts/dashboards
ï Strong communication skills in English
What we offer:
ï Full?time B2B contract
ï Fully remote setup, work from anywhere in Europe
ï Up to 20% tax allowance
ï 22 paid leave days annually
ï Stock options (ESOP) in a fast?scaling, pre?IPO company
ï Flexi benefits you can use for wellness, travel, or learning
ï Work alongside a high?performing, international engineering team in a global fintech unicorn

Relocation support is available to our hubs in Armenia, Georgia, Serbia, Portugal, and Spain, including flights, temporary accommodation, legal setup (if needed).
About Tabby

Tabby creates financial freedom in the way people shop, earn and save, by reshaping their relationship with money.

The companyís flagship offering allows shoppers to split their payments online and in?store with no interest or fees. Over 32,000 global brands and small businesses, including Amazon, Noon, IKEA and Shein use Tabby to accelerate growth and gain loyal customers by offering easy and flexible payments online and in stores.

Tabby has generated over $7?billion in transaction volume for its partner brands and has the highest rated, most reviewed, largest and fastest growing app of any fintech in the GCC region.

Tabby launched operations in 2020 and has raised +$1?billion in equity and debt funding from global and regional investors.
#J-18808-Ljbffr

job_title: Member of Technical Staff ñ Full Stack Developer
job_description:
Member of Technical Staff ñ Full Stack Developer

Location:
MADC (on-site work mode, in Casablanca)

Description

As a Full Stack Developer, you will play a critical role in building scalable developer platforms leveraging GraalVM and Oracle Database.
You will collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver intuitive user interfaces, robust backend services, and seamless developer workflows. Your commitment to code quality, security, and innovation will help shape the next generation of Oracle's developer tooling.

Key Responsibilities
Design, develop, and maintain a scalable developer platform powered by Oracle Database and GraalVM
Build intuitive user interfaces and seamless developer experiences
Develop robust, high-performance backend services
Collaborate with product managers, UX/UI designers, and other developers to shape requirements and deliver solutions
Ensure system reliability, security, and compliance with best practices
Write clean, maintainable, and well-documented code across the stack
Participate in code reviews, testing, and deployment processes
Continuously learn and apply modern software development best practices

Qualifications
Proven experience as a full-stack developer or similar role
Strong proficiency with React for frontend development
Expertise in backend development with Java and web server frameworks; experience with Micronaut is a plus
Understanding of RESTful API design and integration
Familiarity with developer experience (DX) concepts and attention to user experience (UX)
Knowledge of security best practices in web application and service design
Experience with source control systems and agile development
Thorough understanding of CS fundamentals including data structures, algorithms and complexity analysis
Excellent problem-solving and communication skills

Preferred Skills
Hands-on experience with Oracle Database, including schema design and SQL optimization
Experience with cloud-native application development (e.g., Oracle Cloud)
Prior work building or using developer platforms
Exposure to DevOps practices and CI/CD pipelines

About Us

Innovation starts with inclusion at Oracle.

We are committed to creating a workplace where all kinds of people can be themselves and do their best work.
It's when everyone's voice is heard and valued, that we are inspired to go beyond what's been done before.

That's why we need people with diverse backgrounds, beliefs, and abilities to help us create the future, and are proud to be an affirmative-action equal opportunity employer.
Oracle is an Equal Employment Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex

job_description:
Senior Full-Stack Developer with 5+ years of professional experience delivering enterprise web applications using ASP.NET Core (.NET 6+) and Angular (latest versions, including Angular 17+). Specialized in Clean Architecture and Onion Architecture, applying proven design patterns and modern development practices to build scalable, maintainable, and secure systems.

Key Responsibilities
ï Backend Development (.NET Core)
ï Designed and developed secure, scalable RESTful APIs using ASP.NET Core Web API and C#.
ï Applied Onion Architecture to enforce separation of concerns across Domain, Application, Infrastructure, and Presentation layers.
ï Implemented the Repository Pattern to abstract data access logic and promote testability and loose coupling.
ï Used the Mediator Pattern (MediatR)
ï Developed data access layers using Entity Framework Core (EF Core) with:
ï Code First approach
ï Database migrations for schema versioning and controlled evolution
ï Fluent API and Data Annotations for entity configuration
ï Wrote optimized data queries using LINQ (method and query syntax) to:
ï Retrieve complex relational data
ï Improve query performance
ï Minimize database round-trips
ï Designed and optimized SQL Server databases, including indexes, constraints, and query tuning.
ï Implemented Unit of Work for transactional consistency across multiple repositories.
ï Integrated authentication and authorization using JWT and OAuth 2.0, including role-based and policy-based access control.
ï Handled cross-cutting concerns such as validation, logging, and exception handling using MediatR pipelines and middleware.
ï * Frontend Development (Angular)
ï Built modern, responsive, and reusable UI components using Angular 17+, TypeScript, HTML5, and SCSS, aligned with the organizationís design system.
ï Implemented Angular best practices including:
ï Modular architecture and lazy loading
ï Reactive Forms and custom validators
ï RxJS observables for asynchronous data streams
ï Integrated frontend applications with RESTful APIs, managing authentication tokens, error handling, and loading states.
ï * Software Design & Best Practices
ï Followed SOLID principles, Clean Code, and Clean Architecture standards.
ï Applied additional design patterns where appropriate:
ï Unit of Work
ï Factory Pattern
ï Strategy Pattern
ï Specification Pattern
ï Dependency Injection
ï Wrote unit and integration tests for business logic, repositories, and API endpoints.
ï * Collaboration & Delivery
ï Collaborated effectively within Agile/Scrum teams, working closely with Business Analysts, QA engineers, and other developers.
ï Participated in sprint planning, code reviews, and technical design discussions.
ï Troubleshot, refactored, and enhanced existing applications to improve performance, scalability, and maintainability.
ï * Technical Skills
ï Back-End
ï ASP.NET Core, .NET 6+, C#
ï Entity Framework Core (Code First, Migrations)
ï LINQ, MediatR, CQRS
ï Onion Architecture, Clean Architecture
ï Front-End
ï Angular (latest versions, including 17+)
ï TypeScript, HTML5, CSS, SCSS
ï Database
ï SQL Server (design, optimization, performance tuning)
ï Tools & DevOps
ï Git, Visual Studio, VS Code
ï Node.js, Curl
ï Azure DevOps, CI/CD Pipelines

job_description:
We are seeking a talented and motivated Web Developer to join our dynamic team in Al Kharj City, Riyadh Province. The ideal candidate will possess a strong understanding of web development technologies and a passion for creating engaging, user-friendly websites.

Job Description

We are seeking a versatile Web Developer to develop and maintain educational

technology solutions for our polytechnic institution. The ideal candidate will have experience

with multiple programming languages and frameworks, with a special focus on educational

platforms.

Key Responsibilities

Learning Management System (LMS) Development:

? Design and develop comprehensive e-learning platforms

? Create interactive course content management systems

? Implement student assessment and evaluation tools

? Develop virtual classroom environments

? Build progress tracking and reporting features

? Create assignment submission and grading systems

? Implement student-teacher communication tools

Website & CMS Management

? Develop and maintain WordPress-based institutional websites

? Create custom E-Learning solutions

? Integrate content management systems with other platforms

ERP & Portal Management

? Manage Odoo ERP systems

? Develop and maintain educational portals

? Create business management portals

? Educational Technology Integration

Application Development & Maintenance:

? Develop custom web applications using multiple frameworks

? Create reporting systems for academic and business needs

? Implement student information systems

? Design solutions for educational activities

? Maintain existing applications across different technology stacks

Technical Requirements

Programming Languages & Frameworks:

? Strong proficiency in PHP, Python, and C#

? Experience with ASP.NET, Django, and Laravel

? Expertise in WordPress development and customization

? Proficiency in Odoo ERP

? Knowledge of React.js and modern JavaScript frameworks

? Experience with LMS platforms (Moodle, Canvas, or similar)

Database Management

? Experience with MySQL, MS SQL Server, and MongoDB

? Knowledge of database optimization for educational applications

? Understanding of data security and privacy requirements in education

Front-end Technologies

? Advanced HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript skills

? Experience with Bootstrap and responsive design

? Knowledge of front-end build tools

? Proficiency in version control systems

? Experience with e-learning content development tools

Additional Requirements

Education & Experience:

? Bachelorís degree in computer science, Software Engineering, or related field

? Minimum 4-6 Years Of Experience In Web Development

? Experience in educational technology sector preferred

? WordPress certification would be an advantage

Essential Skills

? Strong problem-solving and analytical abilities

? Experience with educational technology platforms

? Understanding of academic and business processes

? Excellent documentation and communication skills

A leading technology company in Saudi Arabia is seeking a talented Full-Stack Developer with expertise in Node.js and React. You will develop and maintain web applications, collaborate with product managers to translate requirements, and ensure the applications are optimized for performance. This role offers a competitive salary, flexible part-time commitment of 10-20 hours per week, and the opportunity to grow into a full-time position. Join a remote-first team that's at the cutting edge of technology.

The position involves developing dynamic front-end interfaces using React and robust back-end APIs using Node.
js/NestJS, ensuring seamless integration, security, and scalability across the stack.
You will work closely with cross-functional teams to design, build, and deploy web platforms and dashboards, automate workflows, manage data pipelines, and optionally integrate AI/ML models into production environments.
Key Responsibilities Design, develop, and deploy scalable web applications using React, Node.
js, and NestJS.

js, including hooks, state management (Redux/Context), and performance optimization.

js and NestJS (or Express).

js, or microservices architecture.

Familiarity with cloud platforms (GCP, AWS, Azure).
Knowledge of automated testing frameworks (Jest, Cypress).

We are looking for a Full Stack Developer with strong hands-on expertise in React and Node.js to design, develop, and deliver scalable web and SaaS-based applications. The ideal candidate has a proven track record of implementing real-world solutions, contributing across frontend and backend layers, and supporting systems through production delivery.

The role requires a practical, delivery-focused engineer with solid technical fundamentals and experience working on modern web platforms

Frontend Development
ï Develop and maintain modern web applications using React.
ï Build reusable, well-structured components using hooks and functional components.
ï Implement state management solutions (e.g., Redux / Redux Toolkit, Context API, Zustand or equivalent).
ï Integrate API-driven data flows, handling loading, error, and edge cases properly.
ï Implement client-side routing, form handling, and validation.
ï Ensure UI performance, accessibility, and responsive behavior.
ï Work with UI libraries or design systems (e.g., MUI, Ant Design, Tailwind, or custom systems).

Backend Development
ï Design, build, and maintain backend services using Node.js (Express, Fastify, or NestJS).
ï Develop RESTful APIs with proper validation, error handling, and security controls.
ï Implement authentication, authorization, and role-based access control (RBAC) mechanisms.
ï Integrate with relational databases and manage data access layers.

SaaS & Platform Development
ï Contribute to the development of SaaS solutions, including multi-tenant and role-based systems.
ï Support configuration-driven features and environment-based deployments.
ï Participate in architectural discussions to ensure scalability and maintainability.
ï Maintain code quality and reliability in production environments.

Collaboration & Delivery
ï Collaborate with product managers, designers, and engineering teams.
ï Participate in code reviews and follow engineering best practices.
ï Take ownership of assigned features from development through deployment and support.

Required Qualifications
ï Bachelorís degree in Software Engineering, Computer Science, or a related IT field.
ï 3+ years of experience in full-stack development with a proven track record in building scalable production apps.

Technical Skills
ï Strong hands-on experience with React (modern React, hooks, component-driven development).
ï Practical experience with state management (Redux / Redux Toolkit, Context API, or equivalent).
ï Strong hands-on experience with Node.js and backend frameworks (Express, Fastify, or NestJS).
ï Proficiency in JavaScript; TypeScript is strongly preferred.
ï Experience designing and consuming RESTful APIs.
ï Solid understanding of relational databases (e.g., PostgreSQL, MySQL).
ï Experience using ORMs or query builders (e.g., Prisma, TypeORM, Sequelize, Knex).

Engineering Practices
ï Proficiency with Git-based version control systems.
ï Understanding of secure coding practices and API security fundamentals.
ï Familiarity with containerization and deployment pipelines (e.g., Docker, CI/CD).
ï Experience working with production environments and supporting deployed systems.

Preferred Qualifications
ï Familiarity with LLM-based development environments or "vibe coding" methodologies
ï Experience building or contributing to SaaS platforms.
ï Exposure to multi-tenant architectures and role-based systems.
ï Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP, or equivalent).
ï Familiarity with frontend UI frameworks or design systems.
ï Exposure to automated testing practices (unit and/or integration testing).
ï Knowledge of data visualization libraries (e.g., D3.js, Chart.js, ECharts) is a plus.
ï Arabic language handling and localization experience is an advantage.

Core Competencies:
ï Fast learner with a hacker mindset and strong product sensibility.
ï Ability to iterate quickly, handle ambiguity, and pivot based on feedback.
ï Strong communication and collaboration across technical and non-technical teams.
ï Attention to quality and usability even in early-stage prototypes.
ï Passion for innovation, experimentation, and building new things

Own product end-to-end
ï Ship core features across our Web app and APIsófrom Figma file to production.
ï Translate user pain points into a focused roadmap and measurable outcomes.
ï Meet with design partners and customers to validate ideas and close the loop.

Full-stack TypeScript
ï Work across the stack + Node) to build reliable, well-tested software.
ï Design and evolve Postgres schemas (Supabase) and clean REST endpoints.
ï Use Supabase for data access; optimize queries, indexes, and background jobs.
ï Connect HRIS tools (e.g., BambooHR/Gusto/Workday) and SSO/OAuth flows with least-privilege scopes.
ï Add observability (logs/metrics/tracing) and improve performance at each layer.

Quality & craft
ï Write maintainable TypeScript, add fast unit/integration tests, and document decisions.
ï Contribute to design system components and accessible UI.
ï Help shape our engineering culture: code reviews, release cadence, and more
Desired Candidate Profile
ï You've owned user-facing features at a startup (or similarly fast-moving team).
ï Strong TypeScript across (or similar) and (Express/Nest).
ï Comfortable with SQL/Postgres, schema design, and pragmatic testing.
ï Excellent written communication; you enjoy writing clear PRs and product notes.
ï Fluent in English; autonomous and product-minded.

Strongly preferred
ï Experience with Supabase (Auth, Postgres, Storage).
ï Detail-oriented and eye for polished frontend implementation.
ï Experience with React Native + Expo for mobile surfaces.
ï Building with third party integrations, webhooks, and OAuth.
ï Bonus: analytics (A/B testing, funnels), Tailwind, background workers (Cloud Run/Functions), and LLM-adjacent features (summaries, routing, embeddings) used responsibly

job_title: Relocate to Malta .NET Full Stack Developer
job_description:
Our client's Microsoft Business Solutions team is a Microsoft Gold Partner and leader in Microsoft software implementations for medium to large organisations, providing their clients with the ability to keep up with the ever-changing digital world by implementing Microsoft's Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) and Customer Engagement (CE) software from the Microsoft Dynamics 365 (D365) software line.

Role Overview

A Senior Full Stack Developer is an individual who has a solid background in development, leads architectural discussions and decisions and takes initiatives to improve or create new standards. A Senior Full Stack Developer will act as a proxy between the development teams and clients and will be working closely with software developers amongst other stakeholders.

Job Location: Sliema, Malta

Work Type: Hybrid

Job Type: Full-time, Permanent

Working Hours: GMT +1

Salary: Base + Benefits (Paid in Euros Ä)

Relocation: VISA & Relocation Package Included

Requirements
ï A minimum of 6-8 years hands on experience in the IT sector.
ï Proficient with object-oriented-programming (OOP) concepts.
ï Proficient in algorithms and data structures.
ï Proficient in relational databases.
ï Experienced in asynchronous programming.
ï Experienced of different software development lifecycles.
ï Experienced as a full-stack developer with experience with (Frontend) and .NET Framework (Backend).
ï Experienced in Single-Page-Applications using a recent JavaScript framework.
ï Experienced in popular source control.
ï Experienced in cloud-based services.
ï Knowledge with document-based databases.
ï Knowledge of containerization.
ï Awareness of DevOps
ï Fluency, both written and verbal, in English.
ï Good eye for detail.
ï Capable of taking self-initiative to learn and deliver.
ï Working in a team environment.
ï Ability to understand, discuss, and influence business requirements.
ï Capable of being flexible and adapting onto different technologies.
ï Mentor and guide colleagues.
ï Excellent organisation and prioritising skills.
ï Software design.
ï Accountability & Ownership
ï Integrity, Honesty & Transparency
ï Quality & Excellence
ï Skilled Problem Solving
ï Communication & Teamwork
ï Customer Centricity

Responsibilities
ï Collaborate with software developers in their daily duties.
ï Utilise technical knowledge and experience to mentor, delegate and assist other developers.
ï Coach and motivate team members, mitigating impediments affecting the team.
ï Drive engagement and motivation to sustain talent and reduce attrition rate.
ï Cooperate with multiple teams in implementing new ideas.
ï Drive internal process improvements across multiple teams and functions.
ï Working with the team to develop programming guidelines/standards and ensure they are adopted and followed by the entire development team.
ï Maintain and set appropriate standards and technical processes, including productivity enhancements, quality measures, and customer-oriented standards.
ï Influence ways of working by participating in various technical discussions and ensure that there is alignment within other development teams.
ï Keeping up to date with emerging technologies and proposing technical advances based on newer technologies.
ï Sharing of knowledge and distribution of responsibilities to elevate team knowledge and eliminate/mitigate points of failure.
ï Continually implementing and fine-tuning processes that increase efficiency in testing, developing, and releasing updates.
ï Participate in project related ceremonies.
ï Working in an Agile, Waterfall or DevOps approach depending on the business requirements.
ï Adhere to best practices and our client's technical standards during the lifecycle of a project.
ï Make use of tools, standards, technologies, and frameworks that are used within the team and on projects.
ï Take ownership and lead the development, improving and troubleshooting of tasks.
ï Work with minimal supervision.
ï Translate business requirements into technical solutions.
ï Ability to look at a problem and come up with practical solutions.
ï Engage with clients and propose innovative ideas on project tasks.
ï Maintain a quality-oriented mindset with testable code.
ï Identify testable areas and contribute towards increasing code coverage.
ï Engaging with stakeholders across the business in terms of understanding business priorities, communicating progress, highlighting success and delivery risks, and managing expectations in line with the roadmap.
ï Communicate progress updates to relevant parties both formally and informally.
ï Lead project architectural design.
ï Perform technology research and develop proof-of-concepts and functional prototypes.
ï Develop and build code with a mindset for reusability and maintainability.
ï Performing impact analysis of any code changes.
ï Contribute towards code quality by taking part in code reviews.
ï Implementation of efficient and performant code.
ï Edit and own project related documentation.
ï Provide estimates for requests, fixes, and new ideas.
ï Contribute to the recruitment process.
ï To perform any other additional duties that may arise from time to time.

Microsoft Business Solutions Overview

Your long-term future is every bit as important to our client as it is to you. That's why their aim is to give you experiences that will stay with you for a lifetime. Whether it's great training and development, mobility opportunities or corporate responsibility volunteering activities ñ you'll gain a wealth of experiences on which to build a rewarding career. Our client is a firm that encourages you to be yourself, values your contribution, and inspires you to act as a role model, always focused on doing the right thing for each other, their clients, and their communities.

This sets out all the different ways you'll be rewarded at the firm. Among other things, you can benefit from honest conversations about your career as well as a range of other rewards. In all these ways and more, they have created an environment that can bring out the best in you.

#Bethechange and #makethechange. Join our client's talented, successful team and make the leap into the future.

Don't worry, our client knows that relocation can be a challenge, which is why they have an extremely supportive onboarding team to help you throughout this process - They provide relocation support for you and your family. Our client is looking forward to meeting you and seeing you grow.

job_title: Senior Web and Mobile Full-Stack Engineer (NodeJS, React, React Native)
job_description:
MDLBEAST is seeking a highly motivated developer to join our ticketing team as a Senior Web and Mobile Full-Stack Engineer. As an engineer, you will play a significant role in developing our ticketing platform and products, catering to the variety of music festivals in the region.
Tasks
ï Develop and maintain code for the NodeJS backend, React web React Native mobile frontend
ï Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify and implement business features.

ï Strong frontend experience in React, React Native and Typescript .
ï Familiary with XCode, Android Studio, and native modules development for React Native.
ï Experience working with headless CMS .
ï Experience with automated testing (Jest, Playwright, E2E API testing).
ï Implement UI based on atomic design methodology and showcase components in Storybook .
ï Experience with serverless microservices architecture in AWS (DynamoDB, Lambda, SQS, EventBridge, S3, CloudWatch, CloudFront).
ï Familiarity with REST APIs and GraphQL.
ï Experience with integration to various SaaS platforms (auth, marketing, notification, surveys, etc.)
ï Experience with mobile app publication process.
ï Ability to work remotely.
ï Good verbal and written English communication skills.
ï Strong problem-solving skills and creativity.

job_description:

ï Ability to manage multiple tasks and projects in a fast-paced environment.

At Stllr Network, weíre building the future of creatorñbrand collaborations, and weíre looking for a Mid-Senior Full-Stack Developer to help us scale our platform. job_description:
About the role

We are seeking a highly skilled senior Node.js web developer to lead backend development initiatives and help architect scalable, high-performance web applications. You will work closely with engineering leadership, mentor junior developers, and take ownership of critical backend services and API design.

Key responsibilities
ï Design, architect, and implement robust, scalable backend systems using Node.js.
ï Lead the development of RESTful and/or GraphQL APIs, ensuring best practices in performance, security, and maintainability.
ï Drive architectural decisions involving microservices, message queues, caching layers, and distributed systems.
ï Optimize existing systems for performance, reliability, and scalability.
ï Work closely with cross-functional teamsófrontend, DevOps, product, and QAóto deliver high-quality features.
ï Conduct thorough code reviews, set coding standards, and mentor junior/mid-level developers.
ï Manage and troubleshoot production issues, ensuring high availability of backend services.
ï Contribute to CI/CD pipelines and cloud infrastructure (AWS, GCP, or Azure).
ï Champion best practices around testing, documentation, observability, and security.

Requirements

Required skills & qualifications
ï 5ñ8+ years of professional experience with Node.js and backend development.
ï Expert-level proficiency in JavaScript/TypeScript.
ï Deep understanding of event-driven architecture, concurrency, and asynchronous programming.
ï Strong experience with frameworks such as Express, NestJS, Fastify, or similar.
ï Hands-on experience with SQL and NoSQL databases (PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, Redis).
ï Solid understanding of API authentication (OAuth2, JWT) and backend security principles.
ï Experience with cloud-native application development (AWS/GCP/Azure).
ï Comfortable with Docker, CI/CD pipelines, and automated deployments.
ï Strong debugging, analytical, and performance optimization skills.

WHERE YOU FIT IN | As a Full-Stack .NET Developer at Whiteshield, you will play a critical role in designing, building, and scaling high-performing web applications that underpin our digital platforms and flagship policy advisory products. You will be responsible for end-to-end development across the application stack, including Blazor front-end components, .NET Core back-end services, and Microsoft SQL Server data layers.You will build modern, maintainable, and secure applications using the Blazor WebAssembly/Server framework, C#, and Entity Framework, while applying best practices in RESTful API design, domain-driven architecture, and database optimization. Your work will extend to developing cloud-native applications deployed on Azure & on-premise deployments to IIS, incorporating CI/CD pipelines, infrastructure-as-code, and DevSecOps principles to ensure robust, scalable, and secure deployments.This role demands a strong understanding of software architecture, data modelling, and emerging AI technologies, including opportunities to integrate LLMís (e.g., OpenAI, Gemini) to enhance user experience and analytics. Youíll collaborate closely with cross-functional teams across design, technical, and business domains to deliver high-impact, production-grade software.KEY RESPONSIBILITIES | Collaborate closely with product teams to translate business challenges into scalable and maintainable software solutions Lead the development of web applications using Blazor (WebAssembly and Server), delivering dynamic, component-based UIís integrated with secure, high-performing APIís Design and maintain API layers using .NET Core, incorporating authentication (OAuth2, JWT), request validation, and rate limiting where applicable Architect robust, modular C# backend services, applying domain-driven design and deploying within containerized environments (Kubernetes experience is a plus) Build and maintain relational data models using Microsoft SQL Server, optimizing performance through indexing, partitioning, stored procedures, and other database tuning techniques Collaborate with data engineering teams to support ETL pipelines, operational data marts, and analytics-ready schemas within a structured medallion architecture Integrate Large Language Models (LLMís) such as OpenAI into products using secure API calls, embedding techniques, and prompt engineering best practices Participate in Agile ceremonies, help refine user stories, and challenge assumptions to ensure technically sound and valuable feature delivery Work from design prototypes in Figma, implementing responsive, accessible, and pixel-perfect UI components using Razor, Blazor bindings, and modern CSS frameworks (e.g., TailwindCSS or Bootstrap) Ensure strong application security through secure storage, encrypted communications, and identity protocols aligned with best practices Build and maintain automated testing suites using xUnit, bUnit, Playwright, or similar frameworks to ensure high-quality releases Manage CI/CD workflows and infrastructure provisioning via Azure DevOps, including pipelines, artifacts, configuration management, and release automation Monitor application performance and reliability post-deployment using Application Insights, Log Analytics, or similar telemetry solutions Drive continuous improvement across the engineering lifecycle, contributing to the evolution of internal frameworks, coding standards, and dev tooling Stay up to date with the latest advancements in the .NET ecosystem, Azure services, and Blazor framework, and proactively share knowledge with the wider team Fluent in English; Arabic language skills are an asset Excellent communication and collaboration skills in cross-functional, agile environments Strong analytical mindset and attention to detail across quality, security, and performance 5+ years of professional experience in full-stack development and web application delivery Proficient in .NET Core, ASP.NET WebAPI and Blazor (WebAssembly & Server) frameworks Deep understanding of Razor components, TailwindCSS, HTML/CSS, and responsive UI design Advanced experience with relational databases: SQL Server, PostgreSQL Proven experience with ETL pipeline development, data modelling, indexing, and query optimization Familiarity with LLM APIís, prompt design, and model orchestration Hands-on experience with DevSecOps tools and cloud deployment workflows Familiarity with Git, GitHub, Azure DevOps, and automated CI/CD pipelines Experience using collaborative wireframing tools such as Figma Cloud experience with Azure and/or Google Cloud Platform - certification preferred (GCP Professional Developer) WHY CHOOSE US | Our Commitment to Equal Opportunities: At Whiteshield, we are committed to providing equal opportunities in employment regardless of individual characteristics. We recognize that our employees feel appreciated when their thoughts and values are respected and considered. Weíre committed to maintaining and driving an inclusive culture and workplace where all talents are nurtured and feel empowered to contribute. Celebrating Achievements: At Whiteshield, we seek to reward those who demonstrate exceptional individual achievements above and beyond expectations in the pursuit of continuously seeking excellence for our clients. When individuals excel, we show our appreciation and celebrate achievements by generously recognizing and supporting the career progression of those who make unique contributions to the firm. Empowering Our People: At Whiteshield, we recognize that our employees are the core to our success and believe that when our exceptional talent comes together, and wellbeing is a priority ñ innovation thrives. We are dedicated to promoting and encouraging a healthy work-life balance and adopting a genuinely flexible working model to empower our employees to pursue a balance that suits their personal needs.

job_description:
About Alaan

We are an AI-powered expense management platform designed to simplify finance for businesses in the Middle East, helping them save both time and money. Our platform offers everything businesses need to manage and control their expenses in one place, including smart corporate cards, AI-powered automation and insights, streamlined accounting, and centralized dashboards.

Since 2022, over 1000 businesses in the UAEófrom startups to enterprises like Al Barari, Rove, Rivoli, Punjab National Bank, and CarSwitchóhave used Alaan to control their spending and reduce costs. Together, our customers have saved over AED 100 million using Alaan.

About the role

We are looking for a skilled and experienced Full Stack Developer to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will bring a mix of backend and frontend expertise, particularly with Node.js frameworks and React.js technologies.

What you'll do
ï Backend Development: Design, develop, and maintain robust backend systems using Node.js, Express.js, and NestJS.
ï Frontend Integration: Collaborate with front-end developers to integrate user-facing elements with server logic.
ï API Development: Architect and implement RESTful APIs to ensure seamless communication between frontend and backend systems.
ï Performance Optimization: Enhance application performance and scalability using efficient coding, caching, and database optimizations.
ï Database Management: Develop and maintain database schemas, queries, and data models, primarily using AWS RDS or similar technologies.
ï Troubleshooting: Identify and resolve complex issues across the full technology stack, from frontend UI adjustments to backend service fixes.

What we are looking for
ï Educational Background: Bachelorís degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
ï Backend Expertise: 2 to 3 years of professional experience with a strong focus on backend development using Node.js.
ï Excellent problem-solving capabilities, analytical mindset, and attention to detail.
ï Proficient in JavaScript, including ES6+ features.
ï Experienced with Node.js frameworks like Express.js and NestJS.
ï Skilled in frontend development with React.js and Next.js.
ï Knowledgeable about AWS services, particularly RDS.
ï Solid understanding of relational databases, SQL queries, and optimizations.
ï Familiar with version control systems, such as Git.

What's in it for you
ï Contribute to building the Middle Eastís most beloved fintech brand from the ground up
ï Benefit from a role with significant ownership and accountability
ï Thrive in a flexible hybrid culture with ample work-life balance
ï Participate in exciting offsite events
ï Competitive salary and equity

job_description:
Job summary

We are looking for a skilled back-end developer to design, develop, and maintain server-side applications and APIs that power scalable, secure, and high-performance systems. The role involves close collaboration with front-end developers, database specialists, business analysts, and DevOps teams to deliver reliable business solutions.

Key responsibilities
ï Application development

Design, develop, and maintain server-side logic and APIs.

Build reusable, efficient, and scalable back-end components.

Integrate user-facing elements with server-side logic.
ï Database & data management

Design and manage databases (SQL and/or NoSQL).

Write optimized queries and ensure data integrity.

Work with databases such as MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, etc.
ï API & integration

Develop and maintain RESTful / GraphQL APIs.

Integrate third-party services and external systems.

Ensure API security, performance, and versioning.
ï Performance & security

Optimize applications for speed, scalability, and reliability.

Implement authentication, authorization, and data security best practices.

Identify and fix performance bottlenecks and bugs.
ï Collaboration & agile practices

Work in Agile/Scrum teams with product owners, business analysts, and Scrum Masters.

Participate in sprint planning, reviews, and retrospectives.

Contribute to code reviews and technical discussions.

Requirements

Required skills & qualifications

Technical skills:
ï Strong experience in one or more back-end languages: Java, Python, Node.js, C#, or similar.
ï Experience with back-end frameworks: Spring Boot, Django, Express.js, .NET, etc.
ï Solid understanding of REST APIs, microservices architecture, and object-oriented programming.

Databases & tools:
ï Experience with SQL and/or NoSQL databases.
ï Familiarity with version control tools (Git).
ï Experience with CI/CD pipelines.

Experience & education
ï Bachelorís degree in Computer Science, IT, or related field (or equivalent experience).

Job Title: Technical Lead Full Stack (Hands-on)

Department: Technology

Job Purpose:

To lead and execute the company's technical initiatives by providing hands-on full stack development expertise, driving technology strategy, ensuring alignment with business goals, and directly managing the performance of the technical support and development team.

Key Responsibilities:

1. Technical Execution & Development

Lead the development and optimization of web and mobile applications (iOS/Android).

Deliver high-quality, scalable code across frontend and backend (hands-on).

Conduct and review code to ensure best practices and maintainability.

Implement performance monitoring and incident response for critical systems.

2. Strategic & Operational Alignment

Collaborate with executive leadership to align technical initiatives with business OKRs.

Contribute to annual and quarterly planning by defining the roadmap for digital platforms.

Propose and defend tech-related budgets with justification tied to ROI and growth enablement.

Evaluate and recommend technologies, platforms, and vendors for long-term scalability.

3. Team Management & Mentoring

Direct and mentor developers, DevOps engineers, and technical support staff.

Define daily/weekly tasks, oversee sprint planning, and ensure timely delivery.

Actively participate in recruiting and onboarding of technical roles.

4. Collaboration & Communication

Act as the bridge between business and technology teams.

Translate business needs into robust technical solutions.

Lead technical discussions with internal stakeholders and external vendors.

Required Technical Skills:

o Frontend: / /

o Backend: / Python (FastAPI, Django) / PHP (Laravel)

o Databases: PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB

o Mobile: React Native or Flutter (preferred)

o DevOps: CI/CD pipelines, Docker, basic cloud (AWS/GCP/Azure)

RESTful APIs and third-party integrations (payment gateways, logistics, marketing tools)

Version control systems: Git, GitHub/GitLab

Performance profiling, debugging, and QA oversight

Leadership & Strategic Skills:

Ability to connect technical solutions with business goals.

Experience leading agile teams and sprint planning.

Strong analytical and problem-solving capabilities.

Budget planning and project ROI assessment.

As our full-stack developer you will work across:

1. Front-End

Flutter (mobile-first cross-platform) using Dart. Figma for clean handoff and UI collaboration.

2. Back-End

You will work with Supabase (PostgreSQL Auth Storage) if you already know Firebase youll learn this fast (the logic is similar).Youll structure clean relational data and build scalable flows.

Role-based user journeys (students men women parents). Secure login milestone tracking and clean progress architecture.

Ship quickly (build and release features fast)Refactor cleanly (improve your code after it works; make it cleaner) andDocument clearly (write simple notes so its easy to understand what you did.)

5. Scale & Language

The app will grow to support English Urdu Arabic Indonesian Turkish and more. You only need English Urduwell handle the rest as we grow.

Must-Have Traits

Mission-aligned you care about helping Muslim women divorce-proof their future marriage

Ultra-fast learner you binge tutorials take notes and build fast

Systems thinker you love clean structure and beautiful logic

Finisher you dont just start strong you also close loops

Clear reliable communicator you know how to disagree and be brutally honest

Scopely has global operations in more than a dozen markets across Asia, EMEA, and North America, and is home to many internal game development teams, referred to as Scopely Studios, with additional game studio partners across four continents.

Scopely was acquired by Savvy Games Group in July 2023 and is now an independent subsidiary of Savvy. Established in 2021 by Saudi Arabia's Public Investment Fund (PIF), Savvy Games Group is a games and esports company formed with a mission to drive the long-term growth and development of the broader technology and innovation industry worldwide.

Job Type: Remote ∑ Hourly-Based

About Us
Hedgehog is an innovative startup that partners with leading companies in the US to build smart, scalable, and modern technology solutions. We develop social media and license social media engagement products, focusing on high-impact solutions with clean design, intuitive user experiences, and advanced engineering.

Job Objective
We are looking for a skilled and motivated developer to help us prototype and build an MVP for a consumer social connection app. This role involves creating both the mobile applications (iOS and Android) and the backend needed to support the app.
This is an early-stage product, so we need someone who is comfortable working in a fast-moving startup environment and who can turn ideas into a working product quickly.

Responsibilities
Build a cross-platform mobile app for iOS and Android, preferably using Flutter
Design and implement the backend/server (authentication, profiles, matching logic, messaging, etc.)

job_title: Frontend Developer ó Build Cross-Functional UI Solutions
job_description:
A recruitment partner in Saudi Arabia is seeking a Frontend Developer to contribute to success in the technical domain. The ideal candidate will have a Bachelorís degree and 3ñ7 years of relevant experience. Key skills include strong communication, proficiency with industry-standard tools, and the ability to work in cross-functional teams. Fluency in English is required, and knowledge of Arabic is a plus. This role demands adaptability to fast-paced environments.
#J-18808-Ljbffr

About PostHog

We equip every developer to build successful products.

We started with open-source product analytics, launched out of Y Combinator's W20 cohort.

We've since shipped more than a dozen products, including a built-in data warehouse, a customer data platform, and Max AI, an AI-powered analyst that answers product questions, helps users find useful session recordings, and writes custom SQL queries.

Next on the roadmap are messaging, customer analytics, ai task creation and coding based on customer data, logs and support analytics.

Our values are not a poster on the wall full of aspiration. They've come from how we really work, day in day out.

PostHog is open source product led, and a default alive company that is well funded.
What you'll be doing

As a Full Stack Software Engineer on the Data Stack team, you'll build end user tools for understanding and traversing their data models.

You'll work on materializing user defined queries, and schedule & resolve DAGs of query materialization.

You'll debug stateful data workflows by digging into k8s pod metrics, and schedule jobs using As you can see, there's a huge breadth of challenges and opportunities to tackle, and nothing is off-limits.

The PostHog Data Stack is both a core product for our users and a foundational platform for our internal teams. Data is a first-class product at PostHog, not an afterthought.

You will have the chance to push the boundaries of what our Data Stack team can do while ensuring we remain stable and production-ready.

You now know what you'll be doing, but what about what you'll need to bring along?
You'll fit right in if:
ï You're a builder. You bring strong skills in building resilient systems, with experience in Kubernetes, Docker, and S3 at scale. We build in python. Async-python and skills are welcome.
ï You have good practices around building resilient systems. Logging, testing and monitoring (observability), but you are also comfortable with debugging stateful, async data workflows by digging into k8s pod metrics.
ï You are proficient in building UIs for data intensive tools. React is part of your toolset.
ï You have experience designing and implementing reliable and highly available backend services . Having used Dbt is a plus.
ï You bring a mix of skills. It's not just about the query engine. You'll need strong backend skills as we run a complex system.
ï You love getting things done. Engineers at PostHog have an incredible amount of autonomy to decide what to work on, so you'll need to be proactive and just git it done.
ï You're ready to do the best work of your career. We have incredible distribution, a big financial cushion and an amazing team. There's probably no better place to see how far you can go.

If this sounds like you, we should talk.

We are committed to ensuring a fair and accessible interview process. If you need any accommodations or adjustments, please let us know
What's in it for you?

Now that we've told you what you'll be building with us, let's talk about what we'll be building for you.

Company Description

Weíre a remote-first, distributed software company with team members spread across the globe. We help startups and scaling companies build products and grow their engineering teams.

Why do people join Clearview? To make an impact. To grow as people and professionals. To enjoy schedule flexibility unlike anything theyíve ever experienced in a workplace. To be surrounded by developers who they can learn from. We are truly excited to be creating waves in an industry under transformation.

We bring Clearview teammates on as full-time contractors, but our list of benefits looks nothing like traditional contract freelancing. We offer all our teammates:
ï Unparalleled flexibility of working hours --which means operationalized family-first, soul-first values
ï Paid skill expansion (so you can keep growing as you work with us).
ï Coworking (or home office optimization) budget
ï A local meet-up budget for our co-located teammates to hang out outside of work
ï Annual summits , for company-wide face time

True innovation comes from an exchange of knowledge across all of our teams. To put people on the path to success, we nurture a culture built on trust, collaboration, and personal growth. You will often work independently, but when youíre working on a team it will be a small, feature-based, cross-functional team. One thing you can be certain of: You will be empowered to take ownership.

Job Description

Are you an exceptionally strong, mid-to-senior Backend Developer with an independent mindset? Do you want to work remotely on challenging projects within a great community? Sounds like youíll be a great fit for Clearview.

We are currently seeking a mid-to-senior-career engineer with ironclad coding skills and the proven ability to work effectively, proactively and independently but within the context of a small, self-directed engineering team.

Qualifications

Youíll need to be:
ï Fluent in the English language, both spoken and written (however: we donít mind which version of the English language it is)
ï Comfortable working effectively, proactively and independently within the context of a small, self-directed team of developers.
ï A fully proactive and self-directed time-management expert, very capable and happy working independently while communicating very regularly with your intercontinental teammates.

What we expect of you:
ï Several years of professional experience in software development
ï Youíll write lots of Node.js code, incorporating best practices, design patterns and frameworks that will last for years to come.
ï Strong experience and understand the ins and outs of JavaScript and Node.js.
ï Extensive experience with Git, GitHub and GitLab
ï Implement automated unit, integration, and end-to-end tests
ï Create pull requests (While youíre at it, review your teammatesí pull requests too, mentoring the more junior members of our development team.)
ï Youíll participate in design sessions with your team members, coming up with the optimum technical solution: one that not only meets business requirements, but does so with performance, scalability and maintainability in mind.
ï Youíll innovate. Thereís always something we can improve upon, whether it be process or tools or technology choices. If you can dream it, youíll likely get to build it.
ï You have a strong understanding of SQL databases (Postgres, MySQL..), Redis and Elasticsearch

It would be awesome if:
ï You have some experience working remotely (but if youíre a clear communicator with rock-solid reliability and youíre curious about making the leap to remote, weíll guide you through it)
ï You understand the AWS / GCP / Docker / K8s services and ecosystem.
ï You understand CI tools and implement CD (Delivery/Deployment)

In this role, you will leverage your extensive knowledge of technology stacks to guide product development and enhance application performance. As an expert in your field, you will collaborate with cross-functional teams to evaluate new technologies and recommend appropriate solutions to meet our product objectives. Your contributions will ensure our products remain competitive in a rapidly changing technology landscape.

Responsibilities:

ï Analyze product requirements and translate them into actionable technical solutions utilizing the most suitable tech stacks.

ï Collaborate with product managers, designers, and developers to define product vision and technical strategy.

ï Evaluate current technologies and propose enhancements to improve product performance, scalability, and reliability.

ï Provide technical leadership and mentorship to development teams, fostering best practices in technology usage.

ï Conduct in-depth research on emerging trends and technologies to recommend strategic implementation.

ï Develop comprehensive documentation that outlines technology stack choices and best practices for the team.

Requirements

Requirements:

ï Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.

ï 7+ years of experience in product development with a deep understanding of various technology stacks.

ï Proven experience in designing and implementing complex applications using modern frameworks and technologies.

ï Strong knowledge of cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, Google Cloud) and their integrations.

ï Excellent analytical skills to assess technology alignments with business needs and make informed recommendations.

ï Exceptional communication and collaboration skills, with a demonstrated ability to engage effectively with diverse stakeholders.

Preferred qualifications:

ï Master's degree in a relevant field.

ï Experience with Agile methodologies and DevOps practices.

ï Familiarity with microservices architecture and containerization technologies (Docker, Kubernetes).

ï Relevant technical certifications in any modern programming languages or platforms.

Benefits

Why Join Us:

Opportunity to work with a talented and passionate team.

Competitive salary and benefits package.

Exciting projects and innovative work environment.

Job Summary

We are seeking a SharePoint Backend / Power Platform Developer to design, configure, and maintain backend components for an enterprise SharePoint solution, ensuring secure, scalable, and reliable data and process management.
Key Responsibilities
Design and manage SharePoint Lists, Libraries, and content structures

Develop business logic using Power Automate
Build and customize solutions using Power Apps (where applicable)
Manage SharePoint App Catalogs and solution deployments

Provide documentation and technical support
Required Skills & Experience
3ñ6 years of experience with SharePoint Online
Strong experience in SharePoint Lists, Libraries, and Permissions
Hands-on experience with Power Platform (Power Automate, Power Apps)
Experience with SharePoint REST APIs
Solid understanding of enterprise SharePoint environments
Experience supporting production environments

Knowledge of Microsoft 365 governance
Banking or enterprise environment experience

job_description:
The Innovation Engineer (Full Stack) is a hands-on engineering role responsible for rapidly building and validating digital Proof-of-Concepts (PoCs) and Minimum Viable Products (MVPs) that support innovation initiatives across Master Works and its subsidiaries. This role requires a product-focused full-stack developer who can operate across frontend and backend layers, integrate APIs, build quick interfaces, and collaborate with AI and business teams to experiment, iterate, and deliver working prototypes. The engineer will work closely with other innovation team members to transform abstract ideas into functional demos or internal tools. This is a highly agile, outcome-driven role designed for speed, creativity, and technical fluency.
ï Design and develop full-stack applications that serve as prototypes or MVPs for innovation use cases.
ï Build responsive, interactive, and mobile-friendly UIs using React.js, Next.js, or similar modern JavaScript frameworks.
ï Develop scalable backends using Node.js, Python (FastAPI/Flask), or other relevant platforms.
ï Integrate external APIs (e.g., AI services, open data, 3rd-party systems) and internal services to assemble composite solutions. Collaborate with AI engineers, designers, and business teams to co-develop smart interfaces and automated workflows.
ï Apply rapid development principles to deliver functional PoCs within constrained timeframes.
ï Package and present working demos with documentation and clear handover paths.
ï Participate in ideation and solution workshops to help evaluate technical feasibility.
ï Create internal utilities or toolkits that streamline future innovation delivery.
ï Ensure code is modular, reusable, and well-documented for downstream use.
ï Collaborate in AI-assisted development environments and iterative workflows (e.g., vibe coding, prompt driven prototyping, Claude Code) to accelerate PoC delivery cycles.

Required Qualifications
ï Bachelorís degree in Software Engineering, Computer Science, or a related IT field.
ï 3+ years of experience in full-stack development with a proven track record in building prototypes, MVPs, or production apps. Proficient in JavaScript/TypeScript, especially React.js, and Node.js.
ï Strong grasp of RESTful APIs, asynchronous programming, and real-time communication (WebSocket, polling, etc.).
ï Hands-on experience working with UI/UX design tools (especially Figma) to translate design mockups, wireframes, and user flows into functional interfaces that match visual intent and usability goals.
ï Solid backend experience using Node.js, Express, or Python-based frameworks like FastAPI.
ï Comfortable with cloud-native development (e.g., Firebase, AWS, Azure), basic DevOps, and version control.
ï Experience working in fast-paced, iterative environmentsóideally innovation, R&D, or early-stage product settings.
ï Ability to take vague business requirements and translate them into working interfaces or services.

Preferred Qualifications
ï Exposure to AI/LLM systems or working closely with AI engineers.
ï Familiarity with LLM-based development environments or "vibe coding" methodologies
ï Familiarity with No-Code/Low-Code platforms and how to extend them via APIs.
ï Good grasp of front-end design principles and usability heuristics, including implementing responsive layouts, component-based structures, and design-consistent user interactions.
ï Basic understanding of design systems and UI/UX heuristics.
ï Experience with prototyping tools or frontend libraries for rapid interface building.
ï Knowledge of data visualization libraries (e.g., D3.js, Chart.js, ECharts) is a plus.
ï Arabic language handling and localization experience is an advantage.

Core Competencies:
ï Fast learner with a hacker mindset and strong product sensibility.
ï Ability to iterate quickly, handle ambiguity, and pivot based on feedback.
ï Strong communication and collaboration across technical and non-technical teams.
ï Attention to quality and usability even in early-stage prototypes.
ï Passion for innovation, experimentation, and building new things
#J-18808-Ljbffr

job_description:
Frontend Angular Developer
Location: Hyderabad

Working Days: Sunday to Thursday

Timings: 10 AM to 6 PM

Job Overview:

We are seeking a skilled Frontend Angular Developer to join our dynamic team. In this role, you will be responsible for developing user-friendly web applications utilizing Angular. Your focus will be on implementing high-quality UI components, ensuring optimal performance, and collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver innovative solutions.

Key Responsibilities:
ï Develop and maintain responsive web applications using Angular framework.
ï Collaborate with backend developers to integrate RESTful APIs and services.
ï Translate UI/UX designs into high-quality, reusable Angular components.
ï Optimize applications for maximum speed, scalability, and usability.
ï Conduct code reviews and maintain coding standards to ensure best practices.
ï Participate in agile development processes, including sprint planning and retrospectives.
ï Stay updated with the latest trends and technologies in frontend development and Angular.

Requirements

Qualifications:
ï 3+ years of experience in front-end development with a strong focus on Angular.
ï Proficiency in HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript (ES6+).
ï Experience with state management (e.g., NgRx, Redux) and reactive programming using RxJS.
ï Familiarity with RESTful services and API integration.
ï Knowledge of responsive and adaptive design principles.
ï Strong debugging and problem-solving skills.
ï Experience with version control systems such as Git.
ï Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related field (or equivalent experience).

job_description:
About the companyTabby builds financial products used by millions of users across the GCC. Data is a core part of how products, risk, finance, and operations are built and scaled. We work with large volumes of data under strict requirements for quality, cost efficiency, and regulatory compliance.

This internship is not educational by default. It is an engineering role with real responsibility.
ContextData engineers at Tabby work on analytics and data platforms that support business decisions, product development, and machine learning use cases. This includes data modeling, data pipelines, data quality, and consumption by multiple internal teams.

The internship is designed for strong early-career engineers who want to grow into data engineering roles. Interns are embedded into real data teams, work with production datasets, and are expected to meet engineering standards from day one.

Key Responsibilities
This is not a helper or reporting-only role. Interns work on real production tasks under senior review.
ï Develop and maintain analytical data models
ï Work with SQL-based transformations and data pipelines
ï Contribute to data quality checks and validation logic
ï Help build and maintain data products used by business and engineering teams
ï Work with orchestration tools and scheduled data workflows
ï Participate in discussions around data modeling, metrics, and definitions
ï Investigate data issues and help identify root causes
ï Improve reliability and cost efficiency of data processing

Skills, Knowledge & Expertise
Required
ï Strong fundamentals in SQL
ï Good working knowledge of Python for data processing
ï Understanding of relational data models and basic data modeling concepts
ï Understanding of how analytical data is used for reporting and decision-making
ï Ability to read, understand, and modify existing data pipelines or models
ï Experience with Git and standard development workflows
ï Structured thinking and attention to data correctness
ï Open to constructive feedback
ï English sufficient for documentation and team communication
Strong plus
ï Familiarity with analytical data modeling approaches (star schema, slowly changing dimensions)
ï Experience with data transformation tools (dbt or similar)
ï Experience with workflow orchestration tools (Airflow or similar)
ï Familiarity with cloud data warehouses (BigQuery or similar)
ï Exposure to BI tools or data visualization
ï Interest in data quality, metrics, and data platform design

Eligibility
ï Saudi nationals only
ï Internship is structured and administered through HRDF
ï We welcome both current students and fresh grads
ï We expect a full-time level of engagement throughout the internship. The program is not part-time: interns should be ready to contribute at a full working-day pace. We understand that students may occasionally need flexibility for classes or exams, which can be aligned with the mentor in advance, but overall performance, ownership, and context involvement are expected at a full-time level.
Format
ï Paid internship
ï Full integration into an engineering team
ï Distributed engineering team across multiple countries
ï Remote work is available from anywhere
ï Office-based work is available in Riyadh
ï Clear path to a junior data engineer or analytics engineer role based on performance

This internship is intentionally demanding and designed for candidates aiming for fast professional growth in data engineering.

Be the change. Join the worldís most visionary developer.

Red Sea Global (RSG) is showing that there is a better way to positively shape the places we live, work and travel.

We are purpose-driven and committed to people and planet. Our transformative programs are a driving force to achieving Vision 2030, as well as leading the world towards regenerative tourism.

Join RSG and be part of the positive change for Saudi Arabia and the world.

Job Purpose:

Supervise the delivery and operation of data engineering pipelines and platforms by coordinating implementation activities, enforcing data quality and compliance requirements, and ensuring reliable, secure, and timely data availability for analytics and AI use cases.

Job Responsibilities:
ï Supervise the development, execution, and maintenance of data pipelines to ensure consistent ingestion, transformation, and delivery of data in line with approved technical designs and operational requirements.
ï Control compliance with data protection, privacy, and governance requirements by ensuring PDPL-aligned data handling, access controls, logging, and documentation across data engineering activities.
ï Review data pipeline performance, stability, and data integrity, coordinating corrective actions for failures, delays, or quality issues with engineering and platform teams.
ï Optimize data processing workflows, scheduling logic, and storage configurations to improve performance, availability, and cost efficiency within approved cloud environments.
ï Coordinate with data science, analytics, and business teams to translate data requirements into executable pipelines and curated datasets aligned with agreed specifications and service expectations.
ï Plan and oversee implementation of data quality checks, validation rules, and monitoring mechanisms to ensure engineered datasets meet usability and consistency standards.
ï Participate in deployment and operational support of cloud-based data platforms, orchestration tools, and automation frameworks in accordance with approved architectures.
ï Review infrastructure-as-code scripts and deployment pipelines to ensure controlled releases, environment consistency, and minimal disruption to data services.
ï Assist in incident response activities by supporting root-cause analysis, remediation planning, and documentation for data pipeline and platform issues.

Job Requirements:

Academic Qualifications: Bachelorís degree in computer science, Data Engineering, or Information

Systems, or a related field.

Years of Experience: 6 years of relevant experience.

Other Requirements: AWS Certified Data Analytics, Microsoft Azure Data Engineer Associate, or Google Professional Data Engineer is preferred.

?? Twitter: @TheRedSeaGlobal

The role holder is responsible to support in planning, deploying, and governing the Enterprise Architecture for SGS, based on the IT strategy and establishing a strong and responsive technology delivery system that extends across functions. Also participate in reviewing overall IT enterprise architecture design, guiding the necessary changes/improvements, formulating future technology strategies and enabling efficient delivery of critical business processes.

Operational

1. Contribute in the roadmaps and migration strategies for applications and information technology architecture to meet business demands and growth across multiple functions and with critical IT systems. 2. Support performing the required analysis to define the architecture roadmap with the goal of reducing costs and improving time to market for IT services in general, but specifically also for the assigned functions. 3. Review the compliance of solution architectures with the master IT enterprise architecture. 4. Undertake the development and review of proposals of SGS projects for external customers. 5. Undertake cost-benefit analysis for adopting new technologies and alignment with technology strategies. 6. Assist in development of IT technical standards documentation to ensure technology compliance. 7. Define and maintain data, application, and technology architecture. 8. Own IT solutions that are used by multiple functions in the Company or are business critical. Be an escalation point of contact for those functions within IT and attend all business scoping meetings.

Support managing IT implementation projects for the functions assigned using internal & external resources per the IT masterplan & management directions. Oversee procurement work and review contracts and recommend changes/amendments before signature. 10. Meet regularly with business managers to obtain feedback on IT support and project management. 11. Attend business review meetings with the assigned functions to understand the concepts being discussed and future directions of the Company/Functions to align IT with the business direction. 12. Liaise with relevant departments to ensure integration and harmony of the architecture. 13. Undertake the maintenance and continuous update of application blueprint in order to ensure overall application architecture visibility. 14. Keep abreast with industry related technologies and trends and guides the technology roadmap development in line with SGS's Business requirements. 15. Ensure leveraging the knowledge resources in SGS to provide technical recommendations and trends to other stakeholders within IT Function. 16. Contributes to performing design reviews in order to ensure that all IT applications are inter-operable, manageable and adaptable. 17. Assess any possible redundancy of IT application functionalities within the application architecture in order to minimize costs. 18. Contributes to planning for future application architecture is properly identified and complies with leading frameworks and standards. 19. Ensure data architecture is implemented effectively and all architectural and technical standards are adhered to. 20. Develop optimized solutions and proposes domain specific remedial solutions to existing data inconsistencies and lack of integrity in order to optimize data storage and reduce costs.

job_description:
Position Summary

The Data & Software Engineer is responsible not only for building scalable data pipelines and backend services but also for shaping the architectural direction of integrations, data flows, and internal applications. The role combines strong hands-on engineering with architectural leadership across data models, APIs, cloud components, and enterprise integration patterns. This engineer will meaningfully influence the design of new systems, modernization of legacy components, and the technical standards used across the technical team.

Major Responsibilities

Data Engineering & Integration
ï Design and implement robust, scalable ETL/ELT pipelines (Snowflake, DBT, Spark, Airflow).
ï Define data models, schemas, and mapping specifications for structured/unstructured datasets.
ï Architect and build integration solutions using REST/SOAP APIs, queues, or cloud- native services.
ï Establish best practices for data quality, lineage, monitoring, and observability.

Backend Software Engineering
ï Build backend services, automation tools, and microservices in Python, Java, C# or any other backend language.
ï Apply software design principles (SOLID, KISS).
ï Maintain and evolve existing services through CI/CD, testing, and refactoring for scalability.
ï Implement secure coding practices, API authentication, and integration security standards.

Architecture & Technical Strategy
ï Lead the design of system architectures for integrations and internal applications.
ï Produce architecture diagrams, data-flow maps, and interface specifications.
ï Evaluate and recommend tools, integration patterns, and cloud technologies.
ï Ensure alignment with organization-wide architectural standards.
ï Provide guidance on distributed systems, data modelling, storage patterns, and message flows.
ï Mentor engineers on design patterns, code structure, and architectural thinking.

Personal Requirements

Competencies
ï Architectural thinking: designs scalable, decoupled, maintainable systems.
ï Strong analytical skills and problem-solving under complexity.
ï Clear communication of technical concepts to diverse stakeholders.
ï Ownership mindset with strong attention to code quality and reliability.
ï Ability to mentor others and elevate engineering standards.

Qualifications & Experience
ï Bachelorís or Masterís in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related field.
ï 7ñ10+ years of combined experience in software and/or data engineering.
ï Proficiency in Python, Java, and C#, with experience building APIs, backend services, and data pipelines.
ï Strong SQL skills and familiarity with modern CI/CD and Git-based workflows.
ï Ability to work with business stakeholders to translate requirements into technical solutions.
ï Strong communication skills and experience collaborating across teams.
ï Exposure to cloud technologies (AWS/Azure) and common integration patterns.
ï Experience with Higher-Ed systems (SIS, LMS) or CRM platforms is a big plus.
ï Familiarity with integration middleware or data governance is beneficial.

job_description:
A global cloud service provider is seeking a Data Center Engineering Operations Engineer to coordinate various operational tasks, analyze performance metrics, and drive improvements in data center operations. Ideal candidates will have at least 3 years of experience in mission critical facilities and possess strong organizational skills. This role offers an inclusive culture and focuses on mentorship and career growth, set against the backdrop of a rapidly evolving cloud environment in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.
#J-18808-Ljbffr

Looking for Data Engineer to support large-scale analytics and reporting initiatives by designing and maintaining robust data pipelines, enterprise data models, and semantic layers. The role focuses on data engineering, integration, and modeling, with Power BI used as the reporting and visualization layer consuming the engineered data assets

Key Responsibilities
ï Design, develop, and maintain enterprise-grade data pipelines using SQL Server and SSIS
ï Build and manage ETL/ELT workflows to integrate data from multiple internal and external sources
ï Develop and maintain semantic models and analytical layers using SSAS
ï Design and implement data warehouse structures
ï Ensure high standards of data quality, consistency, security, and governance
ï Optimize SQL queries, data models, and ETL processes for performance and scalability
ï Partner with business, analytics, and reporting teams to translate requirements into data models
ï Enable and support Power BI reporting by providing certified, well-documented datasets
ï Monitor, troubleshoot, and resolve data pipeline and model issues
ï Maintain technical documentation and data lineage artifacts

Required Skills & Experience
ï Strong hands-on experience with SQL Server and advanced T-SQL
ï Proven experience developing SSIS-based ETL solutions
ï Solid expertise in SSAS for semantic modeling
ï Strong understanding of data warehousing and BI architecture
ï Experience supporting Power BI as a reporting and consumption layer
ï Experience working in large, complex, or enterprise environments
ï Strong analytical mindset with attention to detail and data accuracy
